abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Chemical Professional English is a branch of technical English that integrates English with specialized chemical knowledge. It is specifically used to describe theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena related to the field of chemistry and serves as a foundational course for students in chemistry-related majors in higher education to prepare them for positions in the chemical industry.  Many pieces of equipment used in the chemical and chemical engineering industries are imported from overseas. Equipment manuals, structural parameters, and the like are all in English. This necessitates a large number of highly skilled personnel in the chemical and chemical engineering industry who possess both professional knowledge and proficient professional English skills. Vocational colleges are the primary institutions for cultivating high-quality, technically skilled personnel for front-line production. The advantages of project-based teaching align with the needs of professional English language courses for chemical technology-related majors in vocational colleges, enhancing the relevance and effectiveness of teaching. This approach aims to improve students' proficiency in chemical professional English and help them seamlessly integrate into their professional roles.
EN_ZH: 化学专业英语是科技英语的一个分支，它将英语与专门的化学知识相结合。它专门用于描述与化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程和现象，是高等教育中化学相关专业学生的基础课程，为他们将来在化工行业任职做好准备。化工和化学工程行业中使用的许多设备都是从海外进口的。设备手册、结构参数等都是英文的。这就需要在化工和化学工程行业中拥有大量既具备专业知识又精通专业英语技能的高素质人才。职业院校是为一线生产培养高素质技术技能人才的主要机构。项目式教学的优势与职业院校化学技术相关专业专业英语课程的需求相契合，提升了教学的相关性和有效性。这种方法旨在提高学生的化学专业英语水平，帮助他们无缝衔接到职业角色中。

abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Chemical Professional English is a type of technical English that combines English with specialized chemical knowledge. It is specifically used to describe theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena related to the field of chemistry and is a fundamental course for enhancing the ability of students in chemistry-related majors in colleges and universities to prepare them for positions in the chemical industry. Much of the equipment used in the chemical and chemical engineering industries is imported from abroad, and equipment manuals, structural parameters, and the like are in English. Consequently, the chemical and chemical engineering industries require a large number of skilled professionals who possess both professional knowledge and proficiency in professional English. Vocational colleges are the primary base for cultivating high-quality technical personnel for the front lines of production. The advantages of project-based teaching align well with the needs of professional English course teaching for chemical technology majors in vocational colleges, enhancing the effectiveness and relevance of teaching, improving students' command of chemical professional English, and helping them seamlessly transition into their roles in the workplace.
EN_ZH: 化学专业英语是一种技术英语，它结合了英语和专门的化学知识。它专门用于描述与化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程和现象，并且是提高高校化学相关专业学生能力的基础课程，旨在为他们将来在化工行业工作做好准备。化工及化学工程行业使用的许多设备都是从国外进口的，设备手册、结构参数等也都是英文的。因此，化工及化学工程行业需要大量既具备专业知识又精通专业英语的熟练专业人员。职业院校是为生产一线培养高素质技术人才的主要基地。项目式教学的优势与职业院校化工技术专业专业英语课程教学的需求高度契合，能够提高教学的有效性和相关性，提升学生掌握化学专业英语的水平，并帮助他们顺利 transition 到工作岗位。

abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Definition: Chemical Professional English is a branch of science and technology English that integrates English with chemical expertise, specifically used to describe theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena in the field of chemistry, and serves as a foundational course for enhancing the ability of university students majoring in chemistry-related fields to work in chemical industry positions. Many pieces of equipment used in the chemical and chemical engineering industries are imported from abroad, and their operating manuals, structural parameters, and other information are all in English. This makes the chemical and chemical engineering industries in need of a large number of outstanding talents who possess both professional knowledge and specialized English skills. Higher vocational colleges are the main front for cultivating high-quality technical personnel on the front line of production. The advantages of project-based teaching meet the needs of professional English course teaching for chemical technology majors in higher vocational colleges, improving the relevance and effectiveness of teaching, enhancing students' mastery of chemical professional English, and helping them smoothly integrate into their work positions.
EN_ZH: 定义：化学专业英语是科技英语的一个分支，将英语与化学专业知识相结合，专门用于描述化学领域的理论、技术、实验、过程和现象，并且作为基础课程，旨在提高化学相关专业大学生的能力，使其能够在化工行业岗位工作。化工和化学工程行业使用的许多设备都是从国外进口的，它们的操作手册、结构参数和其他信息都是英文的。这使得化工和化学工程行业需要大量具备优秀才能的人才，他们既具备专业知识，又具备专业的英语技能。高等职业院校是培养高素质技术人才的主要阵地，在生产一线。项目式教学的优势满足了高等职业院校化工技术专业专业英语课程教学的需求，提高教学的相关性和有效性，增强学生对化学专业英语的掌握，并帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are incomparable to historical chemistry. The differentiation between chemistry and philosophy is becoming increasingly profound, and chemistry itself has also moved from macroscopic research to microscopic research, developing from static research to dynamic research. In this context, many famous chemists, from different research perspectives, have deeply understood the important significance of philosophical thought for the development of chemistry. More and more chemistry workers are consciously starting to use the principles of dialectical materialism philosophy to guide their own chemical research. Philosophers are also paying close attention to the progress of chemistry, and thinking about the questions that chemistry raises to philosophy in its development process. The philosophy of chemistry, as an interdisciplinary field between chemistry and philosophy, has emerged as the times require. This discipline is different from ancient natural philosophy, and also different from the “philosophy of chemistry” mentioned by modern chemists.
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度和广度与历史化学不可同日而语。化学与哲学的区分日益深刻，化学自身也从宏观研究走向微观研究，从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这种背景下，许多著名化学家从不同研究角度深刻认识到哲学思想对化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者自觉地开始运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自身的化学研究。哲学家也密切关注着化学的进步，并思考着化学在其发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学之间的交叉学科，应运而生。这门学科不同于古代自然哲学，也有别于现代化学家所提及的“化学哲学”。

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are all incomparable to historical chemistry. The differentiation of chemistry from philosophy is becoming increasingly profound. Chemistry itself has also moved from macroscopic research to microscopic research and developed from static research to dynamic research. In this context, many famous chemists, from different research perspectives, have profoundly understood the important significance of philosophical thought for the development of chemistry. More and more chemistry researchers are beginning to consciously apply the principles of dialectical materialism philosophy to guide their own chemical research. Philosophers are also paying close attention to the progress of chemistry and considering the questions that chemistry raises for philosophy in the process of its development. The philosophy of chemistry, as an interdisciplinary field of chemistry and philosophy, has emerged. This discipline is not only different from ancient natural philosophy but also different from the "philosophy of chemistry" spoken of by modern chemists.
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度和广度都与历史化学不可同日而语。化学与哲学的分化日益深刻。化学自身也已经从宏观研究转向微观研究，并从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这种背景下，许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度深刻认识到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学研究人员开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学的原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也密切关注化学的进展，并在化学发展的过程中思考化学对哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生。这门学科不仅不同于古代的自然哲学，也不同于现代化学家所说的“化学的哲学”。

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are all incomparable to chemistry in history. The differentiation between chemistry and philosophy has become increasingly profound, and chemistry itself has also moved from macroscopic research to microscopic research, and developed from static research to dynamic research. In this context, many famous chemists, from different research perspectives, have deeply understood the important significance of philosophical thought for the development of chemistry. More and more chemists are beginning to consciously apply the principles of dialectical materialism philosophy to guide their chemical research. Philosophers are also paying close attention to the progress of chemistry, thinking about the questions that chemistry raises to philosophy in the process of its development. Chemical philosophy, as an interdisciplinary subject of chemistry and philosophy, has emerged. This discipline is different from ancient natural philosophy, and also different from the "chemical philosophy" mentioned by modern chemists.
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度和广度，均与历史上的化学不可同日而语。化学与哲学的分化愈发深刻，化学自身也从宏观研究转向微观研究，从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这种背景下，许多著名的化学家从不同的研究视角，深刻理解了哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学家开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学的原理来指导他们的化学研究。哲学家们也密切关注化学的进展，思考化学在其发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学，作为化学与哲学的交叉学科，应运而生。这门学科不同于古代的自然哲学，也不同于现代化学家所说的“化学哲学”。

abstract: <正>随着体育运动科学的发展，运动疲劳与过度训练的监测和诊断成为提升运动员竞技表现与预防损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性及内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群等生物化学指标的影响，其中关于能量代谢与平衡的研究，为识别疲劳累积及过度训练提供了新思路。这种生物化学检测手段，不仅提升了体育运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康与高效训练提供了坚实保障。
ZH_EN: With the development of sports science, the monitoring and diagnosis of exercise fatigue and overtraining have become important research directions for improving athletes' athletic performance and preventing injuries. Exercise biochemistry, by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activity, and endocrine indicators in the body during exercise, provides an important basis for the scientific diagnosis of fatigue and overtraining. "Exercise Biochemistry" deeply explores the impact of exercise on biochemical indicators in different populations, including track and field athletes, the elderly, children, and the general population. Among which, research on energy metabolism and balance provides new insights for identifying fatigue accumulation and overtraining. This biochemical detection method not only enhances the scientific nature of sports but also provides a solid guarantee for athletes' long-term health and efficient training.
EN_ZH: 随着运动科学的发展，运动疲劳和过度训练的监测与诊断已成为重要的研究方向，旨在提高运动员的运动表现和预防损伤。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性和内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要基础。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群生化指标的影响，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童和普通人群。其中，能量代谢与平衡的研究为识别疲劳累积和过度训练提供了新的见解。这种生化检测方法不仅提升了运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康和高效训练提供了坚实保障。

Exercise biochemistry, by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activity, and endocrine indicators in the body during exercise, provides an important basis for the scientific diagnosis of fatigue and overtraining. "Exercise Biochemistry" delves into the impact of exercise on biochemical indicators in different populations, including track and field athletes, the elderly, children, and the general population. This biochemical detection method not only enhances the scientific nature of sports but also provides a solid guarantee for athletes' long-term health and efficient training.

ZH_EN: With the development of sports science, the monitoring and diagnosis of exercise fatigue and overtraining have become important research directions for improving athletes' performance and preventing injuries. Exercise biochemistry, by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activity, and endocrine indicators in the body during exercise, provides an important scientific basis for the diagnosis of fatigue and overtraining. "Exercise Biochemistry" delves into the impact of exercise on biochemical indicators in different populations, including track and field athletes, the elderly, children, and the general population, and research on energy metabolism and balance provides new insights for identifying fatigue accumulation and overtraining. This biochemical detection method not only enhances the scientific nature of sports, but also provides a solid guarantee for athletes' long-term health and efficient training.
EN_ZH: 随着运动科学的发展，运动性疲劳和过度训练的监测与诊断已成为重要的研究方向，为了提高运动员的运动表现和预防运动损伤。运动生物化学，通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性和内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的诊断提供了重要的科学依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群生化指标的影响，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童和一般人群，以及对能量代谢和平衡的研究，为识别疲劳积累和过度训练提供了新的见解。这种生化检测方法不仅增强了运动的科学性，而且为运动员的长期健康和高效训练提供了坚实的保障。

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: June 2024 Zhejiang Province Chemistry Selection Exam Questions, while maintaining stability in aspects such as the exam paper format, content tested, and selection of materials, appropriately innovated through methods like rotating test points, innovative presentation, and changing perspectives to reverse the tendency of "patternization" in question setting and "routinization" in teaching. Based on the core concept of "structure determines properties," by creating appropriate real-world scenarios, the intensity of experimental examination was increased, focusing on improving the structured level of the exam questions, and extracting genuine questions that can accurately diagnose and develop students' core competencies.  Simultaneously, high school chemistry teaching suggestions adapting to competency-based selection exams were proposed from three aspects: curriculum standards, textbooks, and experiments.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考题，在保持试卷结构、考查内容、素材选取等方面稳定性的同时，通过轮换考点、创新呈现方式、变换设问角度等方法进行了适当创新，以扭转题型设置的“套路化”和教学的“程式化”倾向。基于“结构决定性质”的核心概念，通过创设恰当的真实情境，加大了实验考查力度，着力提升试题的结构性水平，萃取能够精准诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时，从课程标准、教材、实验三个方面提出了适应于基于核心素养选拔考试的高中化学教学建议。

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: The June 2024 Zhejiang Province Chemistry Elective Examination questions, while maintaining stability in terms of exam format, examined content, and material selection, appropriately innovated through methods such as rotating test points, innovative presentation, and changing perspectives to reverse the tendency of "formulaic" exam questions and "routine-based" teaching. Based on the core concept of "structure determines properties," and by creating appropriate authentic contexts, the exam increased the emphasis on experimental examination, focused on improving the structured level of exam questions, and refined genuine questions capable of accurately diagnosing and developing students' core competencies. Simultaneously, from the three aspects of curriculum standards, textbooks, and experiments, it proposed high school chemistry teaching suggestions adapted to competency-based elective exams.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在考试形式、考查内容和材料选用等方面保持稳定的同时，通过轮换考点、创新呈现和变换视角等方式进行了适当创新，扭转“套路化”试题和“程式化”教学的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”的核心概念，并通过创设恰当真实情境，考试增加了实验考查的考查力度，着力提升试题的结构性水平，打磨了能够精准诊断和发展学生核心素养的真题。同时，从课程标准、教材和实验三个方面，提出了适应基于核心素养的选考的高中化学教学建议。

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: June 2024 Zhejiang Province Chemistry Selection Exam questions, while maintaining stability in terms of test paper format, examination content, and material selection, appropriately innovated through methods such as rotating test points, innovative presentation, and changing perspectives, to reverse the tendency of exam questions becoming "formulaic" and teaching becoming "routine-based". Based on the core concept of "structure determines properties", by creating appropriate real-world scenarios, the emphasis on experimental assessment was increased, focusing on improving the structural level of exam questions, and extracting genuine questions that can accurately diagnose and develop students' core competencies. Simultaneously, teaching suggestions for high school chemistry adapted to competency-based selection exams are proposed from three aspects: curriculum standards, textbooks, and experiments.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考题在保持试卷结构、考查内容和素材选取稳定性的同时，通过轮换考点、创新呈现形式和变换设问角度等方式进行了适当创新，以扭转考题“套路化”、教学“程式化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”的核心观念，通过创设恰当的真实情境，加大了实验考查力度，注重提升试题的结构性，提炼出能够精准诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时，从课程标准、教材和实验三个方面，为适应基于核心素养的选拔考试的高中化学教学提出了教学建议。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important way to popularize scientific knowledge and enhance citizens' scientific literacy. Focusing on three basic questions of why read, what to read, and how to read popular science in chemistry during the initial chemistry education stage in junior high school, this paper explores the significance of popular science reading in junior high school chemistry teaching. It proposes the criteria for selecting chemistry reading books for junior high school and recommends some classic popular science works as reference materials. Combining classroom and extracurricular teaching practice, it elaborates on methods to guide junior high school students to carry out chemistry reading, including critical reading and expression, inquiry-based reading and presentation, the "library + chemistry reading" model, combining classroom and extracurricular activities, multi-disciplinary integration, etc., to improve students' chemistry literacy.
EN_ZH: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提高公民科学素养的重要途径。本文聚焦初中化学启蒙教育阶段科普阅读中“为何读、读什么、怎么读”三个基本问题，探讨了科普阅读在初中化学教学中的意义。文章提出了初中化学科普读物选择标准，并推荐了一些经典科普作品作为参考。文章结合课堂内外教学实践，阐述了指导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究式阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、结合课堂内外活动、多学科融合等，旨在提高学生的化学素养。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important way to popularize scientific knowledge and enhance public scientific literacy. Focusing on the three basic questions of why, what, and how to read popular science in chemistry at the introductory stage of junior high school chemistry education, this paper discusses the significance of popular science reading in junior high school chemistry teaching, proposes criteria for selecting chemistry reading materials for junior high school students, and recommends some classic popular science works as references. In combination with classroom and extracurricular teaching practices, it elaborates on methods for guiding junior high school students to engage in chemistry reading, including critical reading and expression, inquiry-based reading and presentation, the "library + chemistry reading" model, integration of in-class and out-of-class learning, interdisciplinary collaboration, etc., to improve students' chemistry literacy.
EN_ZH: 大众科普阅读是普及科学知识、提高公众科学素养的重要途径。本文聚焦初中化学教育起始阶段化学科普阅读的“为什么读”、“读什么”和“怎么读”这三个基本问题，探讨科普阅读在初中化学教学中的意义，提出了初中生化学读物选择标准，并推荐了一些经典科普作品以供参考。结合课堂内外教学实践，阐述了指导初中生进行化学阅读的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究式阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内课外结合、跨学科合作等，以期提高学生的化学素养。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important way to popularize scientific knowledge and enhance citizens' scientific literacy. Focusing on three basic questions—why, what, and how to read popular science in chemistry during the introductory chemistry education stage in junior high school—this text discusses the significance of popular science reading in junior high school chemistry teaching, proposes criteria for selecting chemistry reading books for junior high school, and recommends some classic popular science works as reference materials. Integrating in-class and out-of-class teaching practices, it elaborates on methods for guiding junior high school students to carry out chemistry reading, including critical reading and expression, inquiry-based reading and presentation, the "library + chemistry reading" model, integrating in-class and out-of-class activities, and multidisciplinary collaboration, etc., to enhance students' chemistry literacy.
EN_ZH: 大众科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。本文聚焦初中化学启蒙教育阶段科普阅读的三个基本问题——为什么读、读什么、怎么读——探讨了科普阅读在初中化学教学中的意义，提出了初中化学科普读物选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典的科普作品作为参考。结合课堂内外教学实践，阐述了指导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究式阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、结合课堂内外活动以及跨学科合作等，以提升学生的化学素养。

abstract: <正>体育作为一种提升身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在多个层面上存在着交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教导及训练过程中，尤其是在运动员的营养补给、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面，均展现出不可替代的作用。从运动员的营养补给来看，化学理论为我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成与能量转换机制。运动员在高强度的运动过程中，需要消耗大量的能量，而合理的营养补给能够确保运动员在训练及比赛中保持最佳状态。
ZH_EN: Sports, as a form of activity to improve physical fitness and enhance health, intersects and integrates with chemistry, a natural science field, on multiple levels. Chemical theories play an irreplaceable role in guiding sports training and instruction, especially in aspects such as athletes' nutrition, the improvement of sports equipment, and anti-doping testing. Looking at athletes' nutrition, chemical theories reveal to us the composition of various nutrients in food and the mechanism of energy conversion. Athletes need to consume a large amount of energy during high-intensity exercise, while proper nutrition can ensure that athletes maintain optimal performance in training and competition.
EN_ZH: 体育作为一种提高身体素质和增进健康的活动形式，在多个层面与化学这一自然科学领域交叉融合。化学理论在指导体育训练和指导方面发挥着不可替代的作用，尤其在运动员营养、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面。从运动员营养来看，化学理论向我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的组成以及能量转化的机制。运动员在高强度运动中需要消耗大量能量，而适当的营养可以确保运动员在训练和比赛中保持最佳状态。

abstract: <正>体育作为一种提升身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在多个层面上存在着交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教导及训练过程中，尤其是在运动员的营养补给、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面，均展现出不可替代的作用。从运动员的营养补给来看，化学理论为我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成与能量转换机制。运动员在高强度的运动过程中，需要消耗大量的能量，而合理的营养补给能够确保运动员在训练及比赛中保持最佳状态。
ZH_EN: Sports, as a form of activity to improve physical fitness and enhance health, intersects and integrates with chemistry, a field of natural science, on multiple levels. Chemistry theory plays an irreplaceable role in guiding sports teaching and training, particularly in areas such as athletes' nutrition, the improvement of sports equipment, and anti-doping testing. From the perspective of athlete nutrition, chemistry theory reveals to us the composition of various nutrients in food and the mechanisms of energy conversion. Athletes expend significant energy during high-intensity exercise, and proper nutrition ensures they maintain their optimal condition in training and competition.
EN_ZH: 体育作为一种提高身体素质和增进健康的活动，在多个层面与化学这门自然科学交叉并融合。化学理论在指导体育教学和训练中起着不可替代的作用，尤其在运动员营养、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等领域。从运动员营养的角度来看，化学理论向我们揭示了食物中各种营养物质的组成以及能量转化的机制。运动员在高强度运动中消耗大量能量，而适当的营养确保他们在训练和比赛中保持最佳状态。

abstract: <正>体育作为一种提升身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在多个层面上存在着交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教导及训练过程中，尤其是在运动员的营养补给、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面，均展现出不可替代的作用。从运动员的营养补给来看，化学理论为我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成与能量转换机制。运动员在高强度的运动过程中，需要消耗大量的能量，而合理的营养补给能够确保运动员在训练及比赛中保持最佳状态。
ZH_EN: Sports, as a way to improve physical fitness and enhance health, has intersections and integrations with chemistry, a natural science field, at multiple levels. Chemical theories play an indispensable role in guiding sports instruction and training processes, especially in aspects such as athletes' nutritional supplements, the improvement of sports equipment, and anti-doping testing. From the perspective of athletes' nutritional supplements, chemical theories reveal to us the composition of various nutrients in food and the mechanisms of energy conversion. During high-intensity exercise, athletes need to consume a large amount of energy, and proper nutritional supplementation can ensure athletes maintain optimal performance in training and competition.
EN_ZH: 运动作为一种提高身体素质和增进健康的方式，在多个层面与化学这一自然科学领域存在交叉和融合。化学理论在指导体育教学和训练过程中起着不可或缺的作用，尤其是在运动员营养补充、运动器材改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面。从运动员营养补充的角度来看，化学理论向我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成以及能量转化的机制。在高强度运动期间，运动员需要消耗大量能量，而适当的营养补充可以确保运动员在训练和比赛中保持最佳状态。

abstract: 在评析前人采用光度法和浊度法，以硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应探究浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作基础上，基于STEM理念，依据学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，利用简单易得的激光头、硅光电池传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块以及智能手机等实验器材，设计、组装了实验装置。应用装置对不同条件下反应过程中硅光电池传感器输出的电压信号进行数据收集和定量分析，得到反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中数值一致。在此过程中，学生能强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验学习化学的乐趣，同时有效提高实验动手能力和问题解决能力。
ZH_EN: Building upon previous work that used spectrophotometry and turbidimetry to explore the effects of concentration and temperature on the rate of chemical reactions, specifically the reaction between sodium thiosulfate and sulfuric acid, based on the STEM concept and relying on the principle of the Tyndall effect already mastered by students, they designed and assembled an experimental setup using readily available experimental equipment such as laser pointers, silicon photodiode sensors, Bluetooth data acquisition modules, and smartphones. Applying this setup to collect data and quantitatively analyze the voltage signals output by the silicon photodiode sensor during the reaction process under different conditions, they obtained conclusions about the effects of reactant concentration and temperature on chemical reaction rates, which are consistent with the values found in the literature. During this process, students could strongly feel the practical application value of theoretical knowledge, experience the joy of learning chemistry, and at the same time effectively improve their experimental skills and problem-solving abilities.
EN_ZH: 基于先前使用分光光度法和浊度法探索浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作，特别是硫代硫酸钠和硫酸之间的反应，基于 STEM 概念，并依赖于学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，他们设计并组装了一个实验装置，使用易于获得的实验设备，例如激光笔、硅光电二极管传感器、蓝牙数据采集模块和智能手机。应用该装置收集数据，并定量分析不同条件下反应过程中硅光电二极管传感器输出的电压信号，他们获得了关于反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论，这些结论与文献中的值一致。在此过程中，学生们能够深刻体会到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验到学习化学的乐趣，同时也有效地提高了他们的实验技能和解决问题的能力。

abstract: 在评析前人采用光度法和浊度法，以硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应探究浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作基础上，基于STEM理念，依据学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，利用简单易得的激光头、硅光电池传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块以及智能手机等实验器材，设计、组装了实验装置。应用装置对不同条件下反应过程中硅光电池传感器输出的电压信号进行数据收集和定量分析，得到反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中数值一致。在此过程中，学生能强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验学习化学的乐趣，同时有效提高实验动手能力和问题解决能力。
ZH_EN: Based on the analysis of previous researchers' work using photometry and turbidimetry to investigate the effects of concentration and temperature on the rate of chemical reactions in the reaction between sodium thiosulfate and sulfuric acid, and based on the STEM concept and the Tyndall effect principle already grasped by students, experimental devices were designed and assembled using readily available experimental equipment such as laser pointers, silicon photodiode sensors, Bluetooth data acquisition modules, and smartphones. Applying the device to collect data and perform quantitative analysis on the voltage signals output by the silicon photodiode sensor during the reaction process under different conditions, the conclusion on the effects of reactant concentration and temperature on the rate of chemical reactions obtained is consistent with the values in the literature. In this process, students can strongly feel the practical application value of theoretical knowledge, experience the joy of learning chemistry, and effectively improve their experimental skills and problem-solving abilities.
EN_ZH: 基于对前人研究工作的分析，他们利用光度法和浊度法研究了浓度和温度对硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应的化学反应速率的影响。并且，基于学生已经掌握的 STEM 理念和丁达尔效应原理，他们使用易于获得的实验设备，例如激光笔、硅光电二极管传感器、蓝牙数据采集模块和智能手机，设计并组装了实验装置。应用该装置采集数据，并对硅光电二极管传感器在不同条件下的反应过程中输出的电压信号进行定量分析，得到的关于反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中的数值一致。在此过程中，学生可以强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验化学学习的乐趣，并有效提高他们的实验技能和解决问题的能力。

abstract: 在评析前人采用光度法和浊度法，以硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应探究浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作基础上，基于STEM理念，依据学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，利用简单易得的激光头、硅光电池传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块以及智能手机等实验器材，设计、组装了实验装置。应用装置对不同条件下反应过程中硅光电池传感器输出的电压信号进行数据收集和定量分析，得到反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中数值一致。在此过程中，学生能强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验学习化学的乐趣，同时有效提高实验动手能力和问题解决能力。
ZH_EN: Based on reviewing previous work that used photometry and turbidimetry to investigate the effects of concentration and temperature on the chemical reaction rate of sodium thiosulfate with sulfuric acid, and relying on students' existing understanding of the Tyndall effect, they designed and assembled an experimental setup using readily available experimental equipment such as laser pointers, silicon photodiode sensors, data acquisition Bluetooth modules, and smartphones. Applying this setup to collect and quantitatively analyze the voltage signal output from the silicon photodiode sensor during the reaction process under different conditions, they obtained conclusions regarding the effect of reactant concentration and temperature on the chemical reaction rate that were consistent with values in the literature. During this process, students could strongly feel the practical application value of theoretical knowledge, experience the joy of learning chemistry, and effectively improve their experimental skills and problem-solving abilities.
EN_ZH: 基于回顾先前使用光度法和浊度法研究硫代硫酸钠与硫酸化学反应速率的浓度和温度效应的工作，并依靠学生对丁达尔效应的现有理解，他们设计并组装了一个实验装置，使用现成的实验设备，例如激光笔、硅光电二极管传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块和智能手机。应用该装置收集并定量分析在不同条件下反应过程中硅光电二极管传感器输出的电压信号，他们获得了关于反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论，这些结论与文献中的值一致。在这个过程中，学生们能够强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验到学习化学的乐趣，并有效提高他们的实验技能和解决问题的能力。

abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；
EN_ZH:
核心要素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同的元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，物质可以根据元素组成进行分类；化学反应前后，元素的种类不变……

分类观：选择分类的对象和分类的视角（特征），元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理的分类，实验仪器和实验操作……

微粒观：物质是由微观粒子组成的；

abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；
ZH_EN: Element perspective: Matter is composed of elements; elements can be divided into different categories, different elements have different properties, elements of the same category have similar properties; the properties of matter are related to the elemental composition, matter can be classified according to elemental composition; the types of elements remain unchanged before and after chemical reactions... Classification perspective: Selecting the objects of classification and the perspective (characteristics) of classification, classification of elements, classification of matter, classification of changes, classification of chemical reactions, classification of conditions for chemical reactions, classification of properties of matter, classification of structures of matter, classification of influencing variables in experimental investigations, classification of experimental principles, experimental instruments, and experimental operations... Particulate perspective: Matter is composed of microscopic particles;
EN_ZH: 元素觀點：物質由元素組成；元素可以分成不同類別，不同元素具有不同的性質，同類別的元素具有相似的性質；物質的性質與元素組成有關，物質可以根據元素組成進行分類；元素種類在化學反應前後保持不變…… 分類觀點：選擇分類的對象和分類的視角（特徵），元素的分類，物質的分類，變化的分類，化學反應的分類，化學反應條件的分類，物質性質的分類，物質結構的分類，實驗探究中影響變量的分類，實驗原理的分類，實驗儀器，和實驗操作…… 微粒觀點：物質由微觀粒子構成；

abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；

Classification Perspective: Select the object of classification and the perspective (characteristics) of classification, classification of elements, classification of matter, classification of changes, classification of chemical reactions, classification of chemical reaction conditions, classification of properties of matter, classification of structures of matter, classification of influencing variables in experimental investigations, classification of experimental principles, experimental instruments, and experimental operations... Particle Perspective: Matter is composed of microscopic particles;
EN_ZH:
元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同类别，不同元素性质不同，同种元素性质相似；物质的性质与元素组成有关，物质可以根据元素组成进行分类；化学反应前后元素种类不变……
分类观：选择分类对象和分类角度（特征），元素的分类、物质的分类、变化的分类、化学反应的分类、化学反应条件的分类、物质性质的分类、物质结构的分类、实验探究中影响变量的分类、实验原理的分类、实验仪器和实验操作的分类……
粒子观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；

abstract: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构性质和变化规律的自然科学，对推动新材料、新能源、新农业以及信息化等领域的发展具有关键作用。将美育元素融入化学基础课程教学实践中，不仅能够激发学生对化学学科的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，强化学生的爱国情感，而且是实现立德树人根本任务、培育全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵动与理性严谨并举的全面发展型人才。然而，当前高校在化学基础课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段，为有效促进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是教师在组织课程教学内容时，要注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，还应综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求、经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验；二是创设美育情境，将PPT、板书和授课语言精心设计、凝炼和融合，打造课堂教学的艺术美；三是创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与美育的融合美；四是凝练美育理论，融入化学基础课教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系，推广与深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。
ZH_EN: Aesthetic education is the education of aesthetics, sentiment, and the soul, as well as the education of enriching imagination and cultivating innovative consciousness. Chemistry is a natural science that explores the structure, properties, and laws of change of matter, and plays a key role in promoting the development of new materials, new energy sources, new agriculture, and information technology, among other fields. Integrating aesthetic education elements into the teaching practice of basic chemistry courses can not only stimulate students' interest in chemistry and promote the inheritance and confidence of outstanding Chinese traditional culture, strengthen students' patriotic sentiments, but also is an important way to achieve the fundamental task of fostering virtue through education and cultivate well-rounded high-quality talents. This educational model is conducive to cultivating well-rounded talents who possess both perceptual agility and rational rigor. However, the implementation of aesthetic education in basic chemistry courses in current universities is still in the initial stage of exploration. In order to effectively promote the integration of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: First, when teachers organize course teaching content, they should pay attention to the logical beauty of the content, not only based on the inherent logical order of the course and following the law of students' physical and mental development, but also comprehensively consider students' interests, needs, and experience background, etc., to ensure that the logical order of the course content is unified with students' psychological development, so that students have a good learning experience. Second, create aesthetic education situations, and carefully design, refine, and integrate PPT, blackboard writing, and teaching language to create the artistic beauty of classroom teaching. Third, innovate aesthetic education teaching, adopt BOPPPS and other teaching methods, etc., to realize the beauty of integration of chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, refine aesthetic education theory and integrate it into basic chemistry course textbooks to promote the high-quality development of chemistry textbooks. These measures provide a reference for gradually constructing a theoretical system of aesthetic education in chemistry courses and promoting and deepening the application of aesthetic education in chemistry course teaching.
EN_ZH: 审美教育是审美的教育、情感的教育和灵魂的教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探索物质结构、性质和变化规律的自然科学，在促进新材料、新能源、新农业和信息技术等领域的发展中起着关键作用。将审美教育元素融入基础化学课程的教学实践中，不仅可以激发学生对化学的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承和自信，增强学生的爱国情怀，也是实现立德树人根本任务、培养全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有利于培养既具有感性敏锐又具有理性严谨的全面发展的人才。然而，当前高校基础化学课程中审美教育的实施仍处于初步探索阶段。为了有效推进审美教育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：第一，教师在组织课程教学内容时，应注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生身心发展规律，还要综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求和经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生获得良好的学习体验。第二，创设审美教育情境，精心设计、提炼和整合PPT、板书和教学语言，营造课堂教学的艺术美。第三，创新审美教育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与审美教育融合之美。第四，提炼审美教育理论，并将其融入基础化学课程教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程审美教育理论体系，以及推进和深化审美教育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。

abstract: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构性质和变化规律的自然科学，对推动新材料、新能源、新农业以及信息化等领域的发展具有关键作用。将美育元素融入化学基础课程教学实践中，不仅能够激发学生对化学学科的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，强化学生的爱国情感，而且是实现立德树人根本任务、培育全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵动与理性严谨并举的全面发展型人才。然而，当前高校在化学基础课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段，为有效促进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是教师在组织课程教学内容时，要注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，还应综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求、经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验；二是创设美育情境，将PPT、板书和授课语言精心设计、凝炼和融合，打造课堂教学的艺术美；三是创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与美育的融合美；四是凝练美育理论，融入化学基础课教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系，推广与深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。
ZH_EN: Aesthetic education is aesthetic education, emotional education, and spiritual education. It is also education that enriches imagination and cultivates innovative awareness. Chemistry is a natural science that explores the structure, properties, and laws of change of matter. It plays a crucial role in promoting the development of new materials, new energy sources, new agriculture, and information technology. Integrating aesthetic education elements into the teaching practice of basic chemistry courses can not only stimulate students' interest in chemistry, promote the inheritance and self-confidence of excellent Chinese traditional culture, and strengthen students' patriotic emotions, but also serve as an important way to achieve the fundamental task of fostering virtue and cultivating people, and nurturing well-rounded high-quality talents. This educational model helps cultivate well-rounded talents who possess both perceptual agility and rational rigor. However, the implementation of aesthetic education in basic chemistry courses in universities is still in the initial exploratory stage. To effectively promote the integration of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: First, when organizing course teaching content, teachers should pay attention to the logical beauty of the content. They should not only base it on the inherent logical order of the course and follow the physical and mental development laws of students, but also comprehensively consider students' interests, needs, and experience background to ensure that the logical order of the course content is unified with students' psychological development, so that students have a good learning experience. Second, create aesthetic education situations, and carefully design, refine, and integrate PPTs, blackboard writing, and teaching language to create the artistic beauty of classroom teaching. Third, innovate aesthetic education teaching, adopt BOPPPS and other teaching methods to realize the integrated beauty of chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, refine aesthetic education theory, integrate it into basic chemistry course textbooks, and promote the high-quality development of chemistry textbooks. These measures provide a reference for gradually constructing a theoretical system of aesthetic education in chemistry courses and promoting and deepening the application of aesthetic education in chemistry course teaching.
EN_ZH: 美育是审美的教育、情感的教育和心灵的教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探索物质的结构、性质和变化规律的自然科学，在推动新材料、新能源、新农业和信息技术发展中起着至关重要的作用。将美育元素融入基础化学课程的教学实践，不仅能够激发学生对化学的学习兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，增强学生的爱国情感，也是实现立德树人根本任务、培养德智体美劳全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养兼具感性敏锐和理性严谨的全面发展人才。然而，目前美育融入高校基础化学课程的实施尚处于初步探索阶段。为有效推进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：第一，在组织课程教学内容时，教师应注重内容的逻辑美。既要立足课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生身心发展规律，又要综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求和经验背景，确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生心理发展相统一，使学生获得良好的学习体验。第二，创设美育情境，精心设计、提炼和整合PPT、板书和教学语言，营造课堂教学的艺术美。第三，创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法，实现化学教育与美育的融合之美。第四，凝练美育理论，融入基础化学课程教材，推动化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程美育理论体系，推进和深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。

However, the implementation of aesthetic education in basic chemistry course teaching in current universities is still in the initial exploratory stage. To effectively promote the integration of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: First, when teachers organize course teaching content, they should pay attention to the logical beauty of the content. They should not only base it on the inherent logical order of the course and follow the laws of students' physical and mental development, but also comprehensively consider students' interests, needs, and experience backgrounds to ensure that the logical order of the course content is unified with students' psychological development, so that students have a good learning experience. Second, create aesthetic education situations, and carefully design, refine, and integrate PPT, blackboard writing, and teaching language to create the artistic beauty of classroom teaching. Third, innovate aesthetic education teaching, adopt teaching methods such as BOPPPS, etc., to realize the integrated beauty of chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, refine aesthetic education theory, integrate it into basic chemistry course textbooks, and promote the high-quality development of chemistry textbooks. These measures provide a reference for gradually constructing an aesthetic education theoretical system in chemistry courses and promoting and deepening the application of aesthetic education in chemistry course teaching.
EN_ZH: 美育是审美教育、道德教育和心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探索物质的结构、性质和变化规律的自然科学，在促进新材料、新能源、新农业、信息技术等领域的发展中起着至关重要的作用。将美育元素融入基础化学课程的教学实践，不仅能够激发学生对化学的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，增强学生的爱国情怀，也是实现立德树人根本任务、培养德智体美劳全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养兼具感性敏锐和理性严谨的全面发展的人才。然而，当前高校基础化学课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段。为有效推进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：首先，教师在组织课程教学内容时，应注重内容的逻辑美。不仅要立足课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生身心发展规律，还要综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求和经验背景，确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验。其次，创设美育情境，精心设计、提炼和整合PPT、板书和教学语言，创造课堂教学的艺术美。第三，创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法，实现化学教育与美育的融合之美。第四，提炼美育理论，将其融入基础化学课程教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程美育理论体系，推进和深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供参考。

abstract: 物理化学是化学学科的一个重要组成部分，它是一门将物理、数学理论和方法相结合的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科技进步起着重要的推动作用，而且对社会经济的发展也有着举足轻重的作用。现阶段物理化学与物理、生物、食品、农医等学科的交叉和融合不断深化，拓宽了学科的应用范围。文章对物理化学教学中出现的一些问题进行了分析，并提出了相应的应对策略。
ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an important part of the chemistry discipline. It is a discipline that integrates physical and mathematical theories and methods, aiming to reveal the basic laws of chemical changes and is the core of the chemistry discipline. It not only plays an important driving role in scientific and technological progress, but also has a pivotal role in socio-economic development. Currently, the interdisciplinary nature and integration of physical chemistry with physics, biology, food science, agricultural and medical fields, and other disciplines are continuously deepening, broadening the scope of its applications. This article analyzes some problems that arise in the teaching of physical chemistry and proposes corresponding response strategies.
EN_ZH: 物理化学是化学学科的重要组成部分。它是一门整合物理和数学理论与方法的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，并且是化学学科的核心。它不仅在科学技术进步中起着重要的推动作用，而且在社会经济发展中也具有关键作用。目前，物理化学与物理学、生物学、食品科学、农业和医学领域以及其他学科的交叉性和融合性不断深化，拓宽了其应用范围。本文分析了物理化学教学中出现的一些问题，并提出了相应的应对策略。

abstract: 物理化学是化学学科的一个重要组成部分，它是一门将物理、数学理论和方法相结合的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科技进步起着重要的推动作用，而且对社会经济的发展也有着举足轻重的作用。现阶段物理化学与物理、生物、食品、农医等学科的交叉和融合不断深化，拓宽了学科的应用范围。文章对物理化学教学中出现的一些问题进行了分析，并提出了相应的应对策略。
ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an important component of chemistry. It is a discipline that combines theories and methods from physics and mathematics to reveal the fundamental laws of chemical changes, and it is the core content of chemistry.  It plays a vital role not only in promoting scientific and technological progress but also in socio-economic development. Currently, the intersection and integration of physical chemistry with disciplines such as physics, biology, food science, and agricultural medicine are continuously deepening, broadening the application scope of the discipline. The article analyzes some problems that arise in physical chemistry teaching and proposes corresponding coping strategies.
EN_ZH: 物理化学是化学的一个重要组成部分。它是一门结合物理学和数学的理论与方法，以揭示化学变化基本规律的学科，并且是化学的核心内容。它不仅在促进科学技术进步方面，而且在社会经济发展方面都起着至关重要的作用。目前，物理化学与物理学、生物学、食品科学和农业医学等学科的交叉与融合不断深化，拓宽了该学科的应用范围。本文分析了物理化学教学中出现的一些问题，并提出了相应的应对策略。

abstract: 物理化学是化学学科的一个重要组成部分，它是一门将物理、数学理论和方法相结合的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科技进步起着重要的推动作用，而且对社会经济的发展也有着举足轻重的作用。现阶段物理化学与物理、生物、食品、农医等学科的交叉和融合不断深化，拓宽了学科的应用范围。文章对物理化学教学中出现的一些问题进行了分析，并提出了相应的应对策略。
ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an important component of chemistry. It is a discipline that combines physics and mathematical theories and methodologies, aiming to reveal the fundamental principles of chemical changes. It is the core of the chemistry discipline. It not only plays a significant role in promoting scientific and technological progress, but also plays a vital role in socio-economic development. Currently, the intersection and integration of physical chemistry with disciplines like physics, biology, food science, and agricultural medicine are continuously deepening, expanding the scope of application of the discipline. This article analyzes some issues that emerge in physical chemistry teaching and proposes relevant coping strategies.
EN_ZH: 物理化学是化学的重要组成部分。它是一门学科，结合了物理学和数学的理论与方法，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律。它是化学学科的核心。它不仅在推动科学技术进步方面发挥着重要作用，而且在社会经济发展中也发挥着至关重要的作用。目前，物理化学与物理学、生物学、食品科学和农业医学等学科的交叉与融合正在不断深化，拓展了该学科的应用范围。本文分析了物理化学教学中出现的一些问题，并提出了相关的应对策略。

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: Life's Chemistry, founded in 1980, is a comprehensive biology academic journal sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology and publicly distributed both domestically and internationally. It is a Chinese core science and technology journal, and has been indexed by international and domestic databases such as Chemical Abstracts (CA) of the United States, Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), Chinese Science and Technology Paper and Citation Database (CSTPCD), Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and China National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI). In 2015, it was selected as a China Association for Science and Technology (CAST) Excellent Journal. It features sections including research papers, reviews, teaching, research frontiers, techniques and methods, and Traditional Chinese Medicine Biochemistry.
EN_ZH: 《生命化学》创刊于1980年，是一本综合性生物学学术期刊，由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办，国内外公开发行。它是中国科技核心期刊，并被国内外数据库收录，如美国《化学文摘》(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库 (JST)、中国科学技术论文与引文数据库 (CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库 (CBA) 和中国知网 (CNKI)。2015年，入选为中国科学技术协会 (CAST) 优秀科技期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生物化学等栏目。

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: 《生命的化学》was founded in 1980, sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, and is a comprehensive academic journal of biology openly published both domestically and internationally. It is a Chinese Science and Technology Core Journal, and has been indexed by domestic and international databases such as Chemical Abstracts (CA, USA), Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), Chinese Science and Technology Paper and Citation Database (CSTPCD), Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and China National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI). In 2015, it was selected as a High-Quality Journal of CAST. It features columns such as Research Papers, Reviews, Teaching, Research Frontiers, Techniques and Methods, and Biochemistry of Traditional Chinese Medicine, etc.
EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于一九八〇年，由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办，并是一本国内外公开发行的综合性生物学学术期刊。是中国科技核心期刊，并被国内外数据库收录，如《化学文摘》(CA，美国)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库 (JST)、中国科学技术论文与引文数据库 (CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库 (CBA) 和中国知网 (CNKI) 等。二〇一五年入选中国科协高质量科技期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生物化学等栏目。

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: "Chemistry of Life" was founded in 1980. It is sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology and is a comprehensive biological academic journal openly published both domestically and internationally. It is a Chinese core science and technology journal, and has been indexed by databases both domestically and internationally such as Chemical Abstracts (CA) of the United States, Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), Chinese Science and Technology Paper and Citation Database (CSTPCD), Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and China National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI). In 2015, it was selected as a China Association for Science and Technology (CAST) Excellent Journal. It features columns such as research papers, reviews, teaching, research frontiers, techniques and methods, and biochemistry of traditional Chinese medicine.
EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于1980年。它由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办，是一本国内外公开发行的综合性生物学学术期刊。它是中国科技核心期刊，并被国内外数据库收录，如美国化学文摘（CA）、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库（JST）、中国科学技术论文与引文数据库（CSTPCD）、中国生物学文摘数据库（CBA）和中国知网（CNKI）。2015年，它被评为中国科学技术协会（CAST）优秀期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中药生物化学等栏目。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. The chemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province, were analyzed using mathematical statistics, Piper trilinear diagram method, and Gibbs diagram method. Simultaneously, the shallow groundwater quality was evaluated using the single-factor evaluation method and the fuzzy comprehensive evaluation method. The results show that the groundwater in the study area is slightly alkaline, and the groundwater chemical types are diverse. The overall shallow groundwater quality in the study area is poor, mainly Class V and Class IV water. The water quality in the study area is mainly affected by evaporation concentration, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。采用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法，分析了河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征。同时，采用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法，对浅层地下水水质进行了评价。结果表明，研究区地下水呈微碱性，且地下水化学类型多样。研究区浅层地下水总体水质较差，以V类和IV类水为主。研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动影响。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. The chemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province were analyzed using mathematical statistics, the Piper trilinear diagram method, and the Gibbs diagram method. Simultaneously, the single-factor evaluation method and the fuzzy comprehensive evaluation method were used to evaluate the shallow groundwater quality. The results show that groundwater in the study area is slightly alkaline and the groundwater chemical types are diverse. The overall shallow groundwater quality in the study area is generally poor, mainly Class V and Class IV water. The water quality in the study area is mainly affected by evaporative concentration, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。河北省任丘市浅层地下水的化学特征采用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图法进行了分析。同时，采用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水水质进行了评价。结果表明，研究区地下水呈微碱性，地下水化学类型多样。研究区浅层地下水水质总体较差，主要为V类和IV类水。研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. The hydrochemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province were analyzed using mathematical statistics, Piper diagrams, and Gibbs diagrams. Simultaneously, the shallow groundwater quality was evaluated using the single-factor evaluation method and the fuzzy comprehensive evaluation method. The results indicate: Groundwater in the study area is slightly alkaline, and the hydrochemical types are diverse; The overall quality of shallow groundwater in the study area is generally poor, mainly being classified as Class V and Class IV water; The water quality in the study area is mainly affected by evaporation-concentration, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper图和Gibbs图分析了河北省任丘市浅层地下水的水化学特征。同时，采用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水水质进行了评价。结果表明：研究区地下水呈弱碱性，水化学类型多样；研究区浅层地下水总体水质较差，主要为V类和IV类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: University laboratory chemicals have characteristics such as large storage volume, large usage volume, numerous types, complex physicochemical properties, and high risk, which poses higher requirements for the safety management of laboratory chemicals. Combining practical experience in laboratory management, this paper summarizes the common problems existing in the traditional laboratory chemical management model and actively explores the application of information technology to solve corresponding problems in terms of personnel training, process management, and hardware facilities, providing new ideas for the informatization and intelligentization of laboratory chemical management.
EN_ZH: 大学实验室化学品具有存储量大、使用量大、品种繁多、理化性质复杂、风险高等特点，由此对实验室化学品的安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理实践经验，本文总结了传统实验室化学品管理模式中存在的常见问题，并积极探索信息技术的应用，为解决人员培训、流程管理和硬件设施等方面的相应问题，为实验室化学品管理的信息化和智能化提供新思路。

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: University laboratory chemicals are characterized by large storage volumes, large usage amounts, numerous varieties, complex physicochemical properties, and high risks, which poses higher requirements for laboratory chemical safety management. Based on practical experience in laboratory management, this paper summarizes the common problems existing in the traditional laboratory chemical management model, and actively explores the application of information technology to solve corresponding problems in personnel training, process management, and hardware facilities, providing new ideas for the informationization and intelligentization of laboratory chemical management.
EN_ZH: 大学实验室化学品具有存储量大、使用量大、品种繁多、理化性质复杂、高风险等特点，从而对实验室化学品安全管理提出更高要求。基于实验室管理实践经验，本文总结了传统实验室化学品管理模式中存在的常见问题，并积极探索信息技术的应用以解决人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面的问题，为实验室化学品管理的信息化和智能化提供新思路。

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: University laboratory chemicals are characterized by large storage volume, large usage volume, numerous types, complex physicochemical properties and high hazardousness. This poses higher requirements for laboratory chemical safety management. Drawing upon practical experience in laboratory management, this paper summarizes the common problems existing in the traditional laboratory chemical management model, and actively explores the application of information technology to solve the corresponding problems in personnel training, process management and hardware facilities. This provides new ideas for the information and intelligent management of laboratory chemicals.
EN_ZH: 大学实验室化学品具有存储量大、使用量大、品种繁多、理化性质复杂且危险性高等特点，这对于实验室化学品安全管理提出了更高的要求。本文结合实验室管理实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学品管理模式中存在的常见问题，并积极探索信息技术在解决人员培训、流程管理和硬件设施等方面相应问题中的应用，这为实验室化学品的信息化和智能化管理提供了新思路。

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: To enhance the innovativeness and interdisciplinarity of organic chemistry experiment teaching, and to explore the pedagogical significance of using polymer reagents in organic chemistry experiments, two experiments were carried out: the Williamson etherification reaction and Claisen rearrangement reaction using phenolic resin as the parent substrate; the synthesis of glucose acetate catalyzed by sulfonated polystyrene cation exchange resin as a strong acid. The teaching research results show that organic chemistry experiment teaching using polymers as reagents can improve students' ability to integrate and apply knowledge of organic chemistry and polymer chemistry; in the process of organic reaction route design and synthesis process optimization, it helps to promote students' understanding and application of reaction atom economy and green chemistry of reactions.
EN_ZH: 为了提升有机化学实验教学的创新性和跨学科性，并探究在有机化学实验中使用聚合物试剂的教学意义，进行了两个实验：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的威廉姆逊醚合成反应和克莱森重排反应；以磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化的葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明，使用聚合物作为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生整合和应用有机化学与高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对反应原子经济性和绿色化学的理解和应用。

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: To enhance the innovation and interdisciplinary nature of organic chemistry experiment teaching and to explore the pedagogical significance of using polymer reagents in organic chemistry experiments, two experiments were carried out: Williamson etherification and Claisen rearrangement reactions using phenolic resin as the matrix substrate; synthesis of glucose acetate catalyzed by sulfonated polystyrene cation exchange resin as a strong acid catalyst. The teaching research results show that organic chemistry experiment teaching using polymer reagents can improve students' ability to apply organic chemistry and polymer chemistry knowledge in an interdisciplinary way; in the process of organic reaction route design and synthesis process optimization, it helps to promote students' understanding and application of reaction atom economy and green chemistry.
EN_ZH: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和交叉学科性，并探索在有机化学实验中使用聚合物试剂的教学意义，开展了两个实验：以酚醛树脂为基质底物的威廉姆逊醚合成反应和克莱森重排反应；以磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂为强酸催化剂催化的葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明，使用聚合物试剂的有机化学实验教学能够提高学生运用有机化学和聚合物化学知识进行交叉学科应用的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化的过程中，有助于促进学生理解和应用反应原子经济性和绿色化学。

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: In order to enhance the innovation and interdisciplinary nature of organic chemistry experimental teaching, and to explore the teaching significance of using polymer reagents in organic chemistry experiments, two experiments were carried out: the Williamson etherification reaction and Claisen rearrangement reaction using phenolic resin as the matrix substrate; sulfonated polystyrene cation exchange resin as a strong acid catalyst for the synthesis of glucose acetate. Teaching research results show that organic chemistry experimental teaching using polymer reagents can improve students' ability to cross-apply knowledge of organic chemistry and polymer chemistry; in the process of organic reaction route design and synthesis process optimization, it is helpful to promote students' understanding and application of reaction atom economy and green chemistry of reactions.
EN_ZH: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和交叉性，并探索使用高分子试剂在有机化学实验中的教学意义，进行了两个实验：以酚醛树脂为基质底物的威廉姆逊醚合成反应和克莱森重排反应；磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化剂用于葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明，使用高分子试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉应用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对反应原子经济性和反应绿色化学的理解和应用。

abstract: 化石染料的燃烧会产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球出现极端天气。绿色发展理念属于人和自然和谐共处的科学观念，能够解决环境与发展的矛盾问题。针对绿色发展的可行性问题进行研究，要求大力发展绿色化学和化工新工艺、新技术，通过多途径培养化学专业人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，从而能够在未来的世界竞争中为化学科学作出贡献。
ZH_EN: Burning fossil fuels produces greenhouse gas CO_2, leading to extreme weather events globally. The concept of green development is a scientific idea of harmonious coexistence between humans and nature, which can solve the contradiction between environment and development. Researching the feasibility of green development requires vigorously developing green chemistry and new chemical processes and technologies, cultivating chemistry professionals through multiple channels, and inspiring college students' enthusiasm for chemistry, so as to contribute to chemical science in future global competition.
EN_ZH: 燃烧化石燃料产生温室气体二氧化碳，导致全球极端天气事件。绿色发展理念是一种人与自然和谐共生的科学理念，能够解决环境与发展之间的矛盾。研究绿色发展的可行性需要大力发展绿色化学和新的化学工艺与技术，通过多种渠道培养化学专业人才，并激发大学生对化学的热情，以便在未来全球竞争中为化学科学做出贡献。

ZH_EN: Burning fossil fuels generates the greenhouse gas CO_2, leading to global extreme weather. The concept of green development is a scientific idea of harmonious coexistence between humanity and nature, which can solve the contradictory problems between environment and development. Research is conducted on the feasibility of green development, calling for vigorous development of green chemistry and new chemical processes and technologies, cultivating chemistry professionals through multiple approaches, and stimulating college students' enthusiasm for chemistry, so that they can contribute to chemical science in future global competition.
EN_ZH: 燃烧化石燃料产生温室气体二氧化碳，导致全球极端天气。绿色发展理念是一种人与自然和谐共生的科学理念，可以解决环境与发展之间的矛盾问题。对绿色发展的可行性进行研究，呼吁大力发展绿色化学及新的化工工艺与技术，通过多种途径培养化学专业人才，并激发大学生对化学的热情，以便他们能够在未来全球竞争中为化学科学做出贡献。

abstract: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace,从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等维度，对近10年我国中学化学教学融入传统文化的研究论文进行可视化分析：传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究共经历3大发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿；最后为拓宽该研究领域的深广度提出实质性建议。
ZH_EN: Excellent traditional Chinese culture is the spiritual lifeline of the Chinese nation, and its integration into subject teaching is of profound significance. Using the CNKI database as the data source and employing the CiteSpace visualization tool, this study conducts a visual analysis of research papers on the integration of traditional culture into secondary school chemistry teaching in China over the past 10 years, from dimensions including research trends, hotspots, and frontiers. Research on the integration of traditional culture in secondary school chemistry teaching has undergone 3 major development stages, encompassing 4 research hotspots and 3 categories of research frontiers. Finally, substantive suggestions are proposed to broaden the depth and breadth of this research field.
EN_ZH: 优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学具有深远意义。本研究以CNKI数据库为数据来源，并运用CiteSpace可视化工具，从研究趋势、热点和前沿等维度，对近十年中国传统文化融入中学化学教学的研究论文进行可视化分析。研究表明，传统文化融入中学化学教学的研究经历了3个主要发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿。最后，为拓展该研究领域的深度和广度提出了实质性建议。

abstract: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace,从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等维度，对近10年我国中学化学教学融入传统文化的研究论文进行可视化分析：传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究共经历3大发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿；最后为拓宽该研究领域的深广度提出实质性建议。
ZH_EN: Chinese excellent traditional culture is the spiritual lifeline of the Chinese nation, and its integration into subject teaching is of profound significance. Based on the CNKI database as the data source, and using the information visualization tool CiteSpace, this study conducts a visualized analysis of research papers on the integration of traditional culture into secondary school chemistry teaching in China over the past 10 years from the perspectives of research trends, research hotspots, and research frontiers.  The research on traditional culture in secondary school chemistry teaching has gone through 3 major development stages, encompassing 4 research hotspots and 3 types of research frontiers. Finally, substantive suggestions are put forward to broaden the depth and breadth of this research field.
EN_ZH: 中国优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，及其融入学科教学具有深远意义。本研究以CNKI数据库为数据来源，并运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace，对近10年来我国中学化学教学融入传统文化研究论文进行可视化分析，从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等视角展开。中学化学教学中传统文化的研究经历了3个主要发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿。最后，为拓展该研究领域的深度和广度提出了实质性建议。

abstract: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace,从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等维度，对近10年我国中学化学教学融入传统文化的研究论文进行可视化分析：传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究共经历3大发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿；最后为拓宽该研究领域的深广度提出实质性建议。
ZH_EN: Excellent traditional Chinese culture is the spiritual lifeline of the Chinese nation, and integrating it into subject teaching is of profound significance. Using the CNKI database as a data source and employing the information visualization tool CiteSpace, this study conducts a visual analysis of research papers from the past 10 years on the integration of traditional culture into middle school chemistry teaching in China, examining dimensions such as research trends, hotspots, and frontiers. Research on traditional culture in middle school chemistry teaching has experienced three major development stages, encompassing four research hotspots and three categories of research frontiers. Finally, substantive suggestions are offered to broaden the depth and breadth of this research field.
EN_ZH: 优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，并运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace，本研究对近十年我国中学化学教学中传统文化融入的研究论文进行可视化分析，从研究趋势、热点和前沿等维度进行考察。中学化学教学中传统文化的研究经历了三个主要发展阶段，包含四个研究热点和三类研究前沿。最后，为拓展该研究领域的深度和广度提出实质性建议。

abstract: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维、增强学生解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的重点目标。对初中化学教学来说，教师通过信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生主动参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成和发展。由此，本文对智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学进行研究，基于对实验教学重要性的分析，从课前、课中及课后三个方面提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学的有序开展，切实提高化学实验教学的质量。
ZH_EN: Under the background of smart classrooms, cultivating students' innovative thinking and enhancing their ability to solve practical problems are key goals of classroom teaching. For junior high school chemistry teaching, teachers build smart classrooms through information technology and encourage students to actively participate in experimental activities, which helps to promote the generation and development of students' core subject literacy. Therefore, this article studies junior high school chemistry experiment teaching under smart classrooms, based on the analysis of the importance of experiment teaching, and proposes corresponding teaching strategies from three aspects: pre-class, in-class, and after-class, to promote the orderly development of chemistry experiment teaching and effectively improve the quality of chemistry experiment teaching.
EN_ZH: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维和提升他们解决实际问题的能力是课堂教学的关键目标。对于初中化学教学而言，教师借助信息技术构建智慧课堂，并鼓励学生积极参与实验活动，这有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成与发展。因此，本文以智慧课堂为背景，研究初中化学实验教学，基于对实验教学重要性的分析，并从课前、课中和课后三个方面提出相应的教学策略，以期促进化学实验教学的有序开展，并有效提高化学实验教学质量。

abstract: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维、增强学生解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的重点目标。对初中化学教学来说，教师通过信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生主动参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成和发展。由此，本文对智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学进行研究，基于对实验教学重要性的分析，从课前、课中及课后三个方面提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学的有序开展，切实提高化学实验教学的质量。
ZH_EN: In the context of smart classrooms, cultivating students' innovative thinking and enhancing their ability to solve practical problems are key goals of classroom teaching. For junior high school chemistry teaching, teachers build smart classrooms through information technology and encourage students to actively participate in experimental activities, which helps to promote the generation and development of students' core subject competencies. Therefore, this article researches junior high school chemistry experimental teaching in smart classrooms. Based on the analysis of the importance of experimental teaching, it proposes corresponding teaching strategies from three aspects: pre-class, in-class, and after-class, to promote the orderly development of chemistry experimental teaching and effectively improve the quality of chemistry experimental teaching.
EN_ZH: 在智慧课堂的背景下，培养学生的创新思维以及提升他们解决实际问题的能力是课堂教学的关键目标。对于初中化学教学而言，教师借助信息技术构建智慧课堂，并鼓励学生积极参与实验活动，这有助于促进学生学科核心素养的形成和发展。因此，本文研究在智慧课堂中的初中化学实验教学。基于对实验教学重要性的分析，本文从课前、课中和课后三个方面提出相应的教学策略，以促进化学实验教学的有序开展，并有效提高化学实验教学的质量。

Based on an analysis of the importance of experimental teaching, it proposes corresponding teaching strategies from three aspects: pre-class, in-class, and post-class, to promote the orderly development of chemistry experimental teaching and effectively improve its quality.
EN_ZH: 智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维，提升学生解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的关键目标。对于初中化学教学而言，教师借助信息技术构建智慧课堂，并鼓励学生积极参与实验活动，这有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成与发展。因此，本文研究智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学。基于对实验教学重要性的分析，提出了课前、课中和课后三个方面的相应教学策略，以促进化学实验教学的有序开展，并有效提升其质量。

abstract: 利用2015—2020年韶关的南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源4个烟叶种植区气象数据和B2F、C3F等级烟叶化学成分资料，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析、敏感系数等数理统计方法，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子，结果表明：(1)韶关烟区烟叶大田期气象条件基本能满足烟叶化学成分指标生长需求，但不同等级烟叶不同化学成分指标受不同生育期的气象因子影响差异较大。(2)B2F烟叶中，影响其氯、氮/碱、总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的平均气温、成熟期的气温。(3)C3F烟叶中，伸根期平均气温是影响其总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期昼夜温差、旺长期日照均为影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；伸根期平均气温、旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期积温、旺长期日照均为影响其糖/碱的关键气象因子；旺长期积温、平均气温和伸根期平均气温、积温是影响其氮/碱的关键气象因子，敏感效应表现相反。
ZH_EN: Using meteorological data from the Nanxiong, Shixing, Lechang, and Ruyuan tobacco planting areas in Shaoguan from 2015 to 2020 and chemical composition data of B2F and C3F grade tobacco leaves, key meteorological factors affecting different chemical component indicators of Shaoguan tobacco leaves were identified through statistical methods such as LSD multiple comparisons, Pearson correlation analysis, and sensitivity coefficients. The results show that: (1) The meteorological conditions during the field growing period of tobacco leaves in the Shaoguan tobacco area can basically meet the growth needs of tobacco leaf chemical component indicators, but the effects of meteorological factors in different growth periods on different chemical component indicators of different grades of tobacco leaves are significantly different. (2) In B2F tobacco leaves, the key meteorological factors affecting its chlorine, nitrogen/alkaloid, and total sugar/reducing sugar are respectively the diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, the average temperature during the rooting period, and the temperature during the maturity period. (3) In C3F tobacco leaves, the average temperature during the rooting period is the key meteorological factor affecting its total nicotine; the diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, the diurnal temperature range during the rooting period, and the sunshine duration during the vigorous growth period are all key meteorological factors affecting its chlorine content; the average temperature during the rooting period, the diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, the accumulated temperature during the rooting period, and the sunshine duration during the vigorous growth period are all key meteorological factors affecting its sugar/alkaloid ratio; the accumulated temperature and average temperature during the vigorous growth period, and the average temperature and accumulated temperature during the rooting period are key meteorological factors affecting its nitrogen/alkaloid ratio, and the sensitivity effects are opposite.
EN_ZH: 利用2015年至2020年韶关市南雄、始兴、乐昌和乳源烟叶产区气象资料以及B2F和C3F等级烟叶化学成分数据，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析和敏感性系数等统计方法，鉴定了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子。结果表明：（1）韶关烟区烟叶田间生长期的气象条件基本能满足烟叶化学成分指标的生长需求，但不同生长期气象因子对不同等级烟叶不同化学成分指标的影响存在显著差异。（2）在B2F烟叶中，影响其氯含量、氮碱比和总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别是旺长期日较温、移栽期平均气温和成熟期气温。（3）在C3F烟叶中，移栽期平均气温是影响其总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期日较温、移栽期日较温和旺长期日照时数均是影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；移栽期平均气温、旺长期日较温、移栽期积温和旺长期日照时数均是影响其糖碱比的关键气象因子；旺长期积温和平均气温，以及移栽期平均气温和积温是影响其氮碱比的关键气象因子，且敏感性效应相反。

abstract: 利用2015—2020年韶关的南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源4个烟叶种植区气象数据和B2F、C3F等级烟叶化学成分资料，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析、敏感系数等数理统计方法，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子，结果表明：(1)韶关烟区烟叶大田期气象条件基本能满足烟叶化学成分指标生长需求，但不同等级烟叶不同化学成分指标受不同生育期的气象因子影响差异较大。(2)B2F烟叶中，影响其氯、氮/碱、总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的平均气温、成熟期的气温。(3)C3F烟叶中，伸根期平均气温是影响其总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期昼夜温差、旺长期日照均为影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；伸根期平均气温、旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期积温、旺长期日照均为影响其糖/碱的关键气象因子；旺长期积温、平均气温和伸根期平均气温、积温是影响其氮/碱的关键气象因子，敏感效应表现相反。
ZH_EN: Utilizing meteorological data from 2015 to 2020 for four tobacco-growing areas in Shaoguan (Nanxiong, Shixing, Lechang, and Ruyuan) and chemical composition data of B2F and C3F grade tobacco leaves, through statistical methods such as LSD multiple comparisons, Pearson correlation analysis, and sensitivity coefficients, identified the key meteorological factors affecting different chemical composition indicators of Shaoguan tobacco leaves. The results showed: (1) The meteorological conditions during the field growing period of tobacco leaves in Shaoguan tobacco area can basically meet the growth needs of tobacco leaf chemical composition indicators, but different grades of tobacco leaves and different chemical composition indicators are greatly affected by meteorological factors in different growth stages. (2) In B2F tobacco leaves, the key meteorological factors affecting their chlorine, nitrogen/alkaloid, and total sugar/reducing sugar were the diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, the average temperature during the root extension period, and the temperature during the maturity period, respectively. (3) In C3F tobacco leaves, the average temperature during the root extension period is the key meteorological factor affecting their total nicotine; the diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, the diurnal temperature range during the root extension period, and the sunshine duration during the vigorous growth period are all key meteorological factors affecting their chlorine content; the average temperature during the root extension period, the diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, the accumulated temperature during the root extension period, and the sunshine duration during the vigorous growth period are all key meteorological factors affecting their sugar/alkaloid; the accumulated temperature and average temperature during the vigorous growth period, and the average temperature and accumulated temperature during the root extension period are key meteorological factors affecting their nitrogen/alkaloid, and the sensitivity effects are opposite.
EN_ZH: 使用2015年至2020年的气象数据，对韶关（南雄、始兴、乐昌和乳源）四个烤烟产区以及B2F和C3F等级烤烟叶片的化学成分数据，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析和敏感性系数等统计方法，确定了影响韶关烤烟叶片不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子。结果表明：（1）韶关烟区烤烟田间生育期气象条件基本能满足烤烟叶片化学成分指标的生长需求，但不同等级烤烟叶片和不同化学成分指标在不同生育阶段受气象因素影响程度差异较大。（2）在B2F烤烟叶片中，影响其氯含量、氮碱比和总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺盛生长期日较温、根系伸展期平均气温和成熟期温度。（3）在C3F烤烟叶片中，根系伸展期平均气温是影响其总烟碱量的关键气象因子；旺盛生长期日较温、根系伸展期日较温和旺盛生长期日照时数均为影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；根系伸展期平均气温、旺盛生长期日较温、根系伸展期积温和旺盛生长期日照时数均为影响其糖碱比的关键气象因子；旺盛生长期积温和平均气温、根系伸展期平均气温和积温均为影响其氮碱比的关键气象因子，且敏感性效应相反。

abstract: 利用2015—2020年韶关的南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源4个烟叶种植区气象数据和B2F、C3F等级烟叶化学成分资料，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析、敏感系数等数理统计方法，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子，结果表明：(1)韶关烟区烟叶大田期气象条件基本能满足烟叶化学成分指标生长需求，但不同等级烟叶不同化学成分指标受不同生育期的气象因子影响差异较大。(2)B2F烟叶中，影响其氯、氮/碱、总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别为旺长期的昼夜温差、伸根期的平均气温、成熟期的气温。(3)C3F烟叶中，伸根期平均气温是影响其总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期昼夜温差、旺长期日照均为影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；伸根期平均气温、旺长期昼夜温差、伸根期积温、旺长期日照均为影响其糖/碱的关键气象因子；旺长期积温、平均气温和伸根期平均气温、积温是影响其氮/碱的关键气象因子，敏感效应表现相反。
ZH_EN: Using meteorological data and chemical composition data of B2F and C3F grade tobacco leaves from four tobacco planting areas in Shaoguan (Nanxiong, Shixing, Lechang, and Ruyuan) from 2015 to 2020, through mathematical statistical methods such as LSD multiple comparison, Pearson correlation analysis, and sensitivity coefficient, key meteorological factors affecting different chemical component indicators of Shaoguan tobacco leaves were identified. The results show that: (1) Meteorological conditions during the field period of tobacco leaves in Shaoguan tobacco area can basically meet the growth needs of tobacco chemical component indicators, but different chemical component indicators of different grades of tobacco leaves are greatly affected by meteorological factors in different growth periods. (2) In B2F tobacco leaves, the key meteorological factors affecting its chlorine, nitrogen/alkali, and total sugar/reducing sugar are respectively diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, average temperature during the root elongation period, and temperature during the maturity period. (3) In C3F tobacco leaves, average temperature during the root elongation period is the key meteorological factor affecting its total nicotine; diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, diurnal temperature range during the root elongation period, and sunshine duration during the vigorous growth period are all key meteorological factors affecting its chlorine content; average temperature during the root elongation period, diurnal temperature range during the vigorous growth period, accumulated temperature during the root elongation period, and sunshine duration during the vigorous growth period are all key meteorological factors affecting its sugar/alkali; accumulated temperature and average temperature during the vigorous growth period, and average temperature and accumulated temperature during the root elongation period are key meteorological factors affecting its nitrogen/alkali, and the sensitivity effects show opposite trends.
EN_ZH: 利用2015—2020年韶关（南雄、始兴、乐昌、乳源）四个烟区B2F和C3F等级烟叶气象数据及化学成分数据，通过LSD多重比较、Pearson相关分析、敏感性系数等数学统计方法，明确了影响韶关烟叶不同化学成分指标的关键气象因子。结果表明：（1）韶关烟区烟叶田间期气象条件基本能满足烟叶化学成分指标的生长需求，但不同等级烟叶的不同化学成分指标受不同生育期气象因子的影响程度较大。（2）在B2F烟叶中，影响其氯、氮碱比、总糖/还原糖的关键气象因子分别是旺长期日较差、根系伸长平均温度和成熟期温度。（3）在C3F烟叶中，根系伸长期平均温度是影响其总烟碱的关键气象因子；旺长期日较差、根系伸长期日较差、旺长期日照时数均是影响其氯含量的关键气象因子；根系伸长期平均温度、旺长期日较差、根系伸长期积温、旺长期日照时数均是影响其糖碱比的关键气象因子；旺长期积温和平均温度、根系伸长期平均温度和积温是影响其氮碱比的关键气象因子，且敏感性效应呈相反趋势。

abstract: 随着环境问题日益严峻，可持续发展理念重要性逐渐凸显，环境化学在化工行业的人才培养中变得尤为关键。文章探讨了将环境化学与可持续发展理念融入化工教育的策略，包括课程设置的改革、实践教学的加强、绿色化学理念的推广以及跨学科合作能力的培养。研究方法涉及案例分析和教学实践相结合，旨在提高未来化工人才在环境保护和资源可持续利用方面的知识和技能。主要结论显示，通过改革教学方法、运用现代教育技术、增加校企合作，以及强化教学评价体系，可以有效地增强学生的环保意识、解决实际问题的能力和跨学科合作技能，为化工行业的可持续发展培养合格人才。
ZH_EN: With increasingly serious environmental problems, the importance of sustainable development concepts is gradually highlighted, and environmental chemistry becomes particularly crucial in talent training in the chemical industry. This article explores strategies for integrating environmental chemistry and sustainable development concepts into chemical engineering education, including curriculum reform, strengthening practical teaching, promoting green chemistry concepts, and cultivating interdisciplinary collaboration skills. The research methodology involves a combination of case analysis and teaching practice, aiming to improve the knowledge and skills of future chemical engineering talents in environmental protection and sustainable resource utilization. The main conclusions show that by reforming teaching methods, applying modern educational technologies, increasing industry-university collaboration, and strengthening the teaching evaluation system, it is possible to effectively enhance students' environmental awareness, problem-solving abilities, and interdisciplinary collaboration skills, and cultivate qualified talents for the sustainable development of the chemical industry.
EN_ZH: 随着环境问题日益严峻，可持续发展理念的重要性逐渐凸显，环境化学在化工行业人才培养中显得尤为关键。本文探讨了将环境化学与可持续发展理念融入化工工程教育的策略，包括课程改革、加强实践教学、推广绿色化学理念以及培养跨学科协作能力。研究方法结合了案例分析和教学实践，旨在提高未来化工工程人才在环境保护和可持续资源利用方面的知识与技能。主要结论表明，通过改革教学方法、应用现代教育技术、加强产学研合作以及强化教学评价体系，能够有效提升学生的环保意识、问题解决能力和跨学科协作能力，为化工行业的可持续发展培养合格人才。
