abstract: 无论是全国卷还是各省区市试卷,高考化学试题都需要以高考评价体系立意,确保试题“一核”功能的有效发挥。从三个层面剖析了高考试题引导教学的维度与取向。以2024年高考新课标卷化学试题为例,详细阐述了高考评价体系立意的高考试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准的一致性,考查要求与课程目标追求的一致性,价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性,为各省区市命制高考化学试题提供借鉴和启示。
ZH_EN: Whether it is the national examination papers or those from various provinces and municipalities, the chemistry questions in the college entrance examination need to be designed based on the evaluation system of the college entrance examination to ensure the effective functioning of the "one core" purpose of the questions. The dimensions and orientations of how the college entrance examination questions guide teaching are analyzed from three levels. Taking the chemistry questions of the 2024 new curriculum standard college entrance examination papers as an example, it is elaborated in detail how the college entrance examination questions, designed with the evaluation system in mind, achieve consistency between the content assessed and academic quality standards, between assessment requirements and curriculum objectives, and between value guidance and the embodiment of comprehensive competencies, providing reference and inspiration for the formulation of college entrance examination chemistry questions in various provinces and municipalities.
EN_ZH: 无论是全国卷还是各省市卷，高考化学试题都需要基于高考评价体系进行设计，以确保试题“一核”目的的有效发挥。从三个层面分析高考化学试题如何引导教学的方向与维度。以2024年新课标高考化学试题为例，详细阐述了基于高考评价体系设计的高考试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准、考查要求与课程目标、价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性，为各省市高考化学试题的命制提供参考与启示。

abstract: 无论是全国卷还是各省区市试卷,高考化学试题都需要以高考评价体系立意,确保试题“一核”功能的有效发挥。从三个层面剖析了高考试题引导教学的维度与取向。以2024年高考新课标卷化学试题为例,详细阐述了高考评价体系立意的高考试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准的一致性,考查要求与课程目标追求的一致性,价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性,为各省区市命制高考化学试题提供借鉴和启示。
ZH_EN: Whether it is the national examination papers or those from various provinces and municipalities, the chemistry questions in the college entrance examination must be designed with the intention of the college entrance evaluation system to ensure the effective functioning of the "one core" purpose of the questions. The dimensions and orientations of how the college entrance examination questions guide teaching are analyzed from three levels. Taking the 2024 new curriculum standard chemistry examination paper as an example, it is detailed how the college entrance examination questions, designed with the intention of the evaluation system, achieve consistency between the content examined and academic quality standards, between examination requirements and curriculum objectives, and between value guidance and the embodiment of comprehensive literacy, providing reference and inspiration for the creation of chemistry examination questions in various provinces and municipalities.
EN_ZH: 无论是全国卷还是各省市卷，高考化学试题都必须以高考评价体系的立意进行设计，才能保证试题“一核”目的的有效发挥。从三个层面分析高考化学试题对教学的导向维度和导向方向。以2024年新课标化学卷为例，详细阐述以评价体系立意设计的高考化学试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准、考查要求与课程目标、价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性，为各省市化学试题命制提供借鉴和启发。

abstract: 无论是全国卷还是各省区市试卷,高考化学试题都需要以高考评价体系立意,确保试题“一核”功能的有效发挥。从三个层面剖析了高考试题引导教学的维度与取向。以2024年高考新课标卷化学试题为例,详细阐述了高考评价体系立意的高考试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准的一致性,考查要求与课程目标追求的一致性,价值引领与综合素养体现的一致性,为各省区市命制高考化学试题提供借鉴和启示。
ZH_EN: Whether it is the national examination papers or those from various provinces and regions, the chemistry questions in the college entrance examination must be designed based on the evaluation system to ensure the effective functioning of the "one core" purpose of the test. The dimensions and orientations of how the college entrance examination questions guide teaching are analyzed from three levels. Taking the 2024 new curriculum standard chemistry examination paper as an example, it elaborates in detail how the college entrance examination questions, designed with the evaluation system in mind, achieve consistency between the content assessed and academic quality standards, between the assessment requirements and the pursuit of curriculum objectives, and between value guidance and the embodiment of comprehensive literacy, providing reference and inspiration for the creation of chemistry examination questions in various provinces and regions.
EN_ZH: 无论是全国卷还是各省区试卷，高考化学试题都必须依据评价体系进行设计，以确保“一核”考查目的的有效发挥。从三个层面分析了高考化学试题对教学的导向维度与导向。以2024年新课标化学试卷为例，详细阐述了依据评价体系设计的高考化学试题如何实现考查内容与学业质量标准之间、考查要求与课程目标追求之间、价值引领与综合素养体现之间的契合，为各省区化学试题命制提供借鉴和启示。

abstract: 随着中职教育的不断发展，新型的教学方式在实际教学中的作用越来越显著。对于中职化学教学，基于微课的翻转课堂教学模式应用，不仅改变了中职化学的教学思路和组织模式，而且大大提升了化学教学的效率，在促进学科教学质量提升和学生综合能力培养方面发挥着重要作用。本文对基于微课的翻转课堂模式在中职化学教学活动的应用进行了初步分析，以期对新时期中职化学教学改革和优化提供一定参考。
ZH_EN: With the continuous development of secondary vocational education, the role of new teaching methods in practical teaching has become increasingly significant. For secondary vocational chemistry education, the application of the flipped classroom model based on micro-lectures not only changes the teaching approach and organizational mode of chemistry education but also significantly enhances the efficiency of chemistry teaching. It plays an important role in promoting the improvement of subject teaching quality and the cultivation of students' comprehensive abilities. This paper provides a preliminary analysis of the application of the flipped classroom model based on micro-lectures in secondary vocational chemistry teaching activities, aiming to offer some reference for the reform and optimization of chemistry education in the new era.
EN_ZH: 随着中等职业教育的不断发展，新型教学方法在实践教学中的作用日益显著。对于中职化学教育而言，基于微课的翻转课堂模式的应用，不仅改变了化学教育的教学方式和组织模式，还显著提升了化学教学的效率，对促进学科教学质量的提升和学生综合能力的培养具有重要作用。本文就基于微课的翻转课堂模式在中职化学教学活动中的应用进行了初步分析，以期为新时代化学教育的改革与优化提供一些参考。

abstract: 随着中职教育的不断发展，新型的教学方式在实际教学中的作用越来越显著。对于中职化学教学，基于微课的翻转课堂教学模式应用，不仅改变了中职化学的教学思路和组织模式，而且大大提升了化学教学的效率，在促进学科教学质量提升和学生综合能力培养方面发挥着重要作用。本文对基于微课的翻转课堂模式在中职化学教学活动的应用进行了初步分析，以期对新时期中职化学教学改革和优化提供一定参考。
ZH_EN: With the continuous development of secondary vocational education, the role of new teaching methods in practical teaching has become increasingly significant. For secondary vocational chemistry education, the application of the flipped classroom model based on micro-lessons not only transforms the teaching approach and organizational structure but also significantly enhances the efficiency of chemistry instruction. It plays a crucial role in improving the quality of subject teaching and fostering students' comprehensive abilities. This paper provides a preliminary analysis of the application of the micro-lesson-based flipped classroom model in secondary vocational chemistry teaching activities, aiming to offer insights for the reform and optimization of chemistry education in the new era.

abstract: 人教版《义务教育教科书化学九年级上册》为落实《义务教育化学课程标准(2022年版)》要求,完善课题结构,更新教材内容,改进呈现方式,聚焦核心素养培育,发挥课程育人功能。介绍了教材各单元在以上方面的具体做法,并提出相关教学建议。
ZH_EN: The People's Education Press "Compulsory Education Textbook Chemistry Grade 9 Volume 1" aims to implement the requirements of the "Compulsory Education Chemistry Curriculum Standards (2022 Edition)," improve the topic structure, update the textbook content, enhance the presentation methods, focus on cultivating core competencies, and leverage the educational function of the curriculum. It introduces specific practices of each unit in the textbook regarding the above aspects and provides relevant teaching suggestions.
EN_ZH: 人民教育出版社《义务教育教科书 化学 九年级 上册》旨在落实《义务教育化学课程标准（2022年版）》要求，完善课题结构，更新教材内容，改进呈现方式，注重核心素养培养，发挥课程育人功能，介绍教材各单元在上述方面的具体做法并提供相关教学建议。

It details the specific approaches taken by each unit of the textbook in these aspects and provides relevant teaching suggestions.

It introduces specific approaches taken by each unit of the textbook in these aspects and provides relevant teaching suggestions.
EN_ZH: 人民教育出版社《义务教育教科书 化学 九年级 上册》旨在落实《义务教育化学课程标准（2022年版）》要求，完善课题结构，更新教材内容，改进呈现方式，注重核心素养培养，发挥课程育人功能，介绍了教材各单元在这些方面采取的具体做法，并提供了相关教学建议。

abstract: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师很难将碎片化的知识进行充分整理，学生学习能力和综合素质的提高均受到较大影响。然而，游戏式教学法能够以鲜明的教学主题为核心，有效整合初中化学知识，从而形成更具系统性与结构性的知识框架，避免教学内容始终停留在浅层阶段。本文简要阐述初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，提出以游戏教学法对化学符号的知识进行复习教学的策略。
ZH_EN: In traditional junior high school chemistry review teaching activities, it is difficult for teachers to fully organize fragmented knowledge, which significantly affects the improvement of students' learning abilities and overall quality. However, game-based teaching methods can effectively integrate junior high school chemistry knowledge around a clear teaching theme, forming a more systematic and structured knowledge framework, thereby avoiding the teaching content from remaining at a superficial level. This article briefly outlines the problems existing in junior high school chemistry review teaching and proposes strategies for using game-based teaching methods to review knowledge of chemical symbols.
EN_ZH: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师难以全面组织碎片化知识，这显著影响了学生学习能力和整体素质的提升。然而，游戏化教学方法能够围绕明确的教学主题，有效整合初中化学知识，形成更为系统化和结构化的知识框架，从而避免教学内容停留在表面层次。本文简要概述了初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，并提出了运用游戏化教学方法复习化学符号知识的策略。

abstract: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师很难将碎片化的知识进行充分整理，学生学习能力和综合素质的提高均受到较大影响。然而，游戏式教学法能够以鲜明的教学主题为核心，有效整合初中化学知识，从而形成更具系统性与结构性的知识框架，避免教学内容始终停留在浅层阶段。本文简要阐述初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，提出以游戏教学法对化学符号的知识进行复习教学的策略。
ZH_EN: In traditional junior high school chemistry review teaching activities, teachers find it difficult to fully organize fragmented knowledge, which significantly impacts the improvement of students' learning abilities and overall quality. However, game-based teaching methods, centered around distinct teaching themes, can effectively integrate junior high school chemistry knowledge, thereby forming a more systematic and structured knowledge framework and preventing teaching content from remaining at a superficial level. This article briefly outlines the issues present in junior high school chemistry review teaching and proposes strategies for using game-based teaching methods to review knowledge of chemical symbols.
EN_ZH: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师难以全面组织碎片化的知识，这对学生学习能力和综合素质的提升产生了显著影响。然而，以鲜明教学主题为核心的游戏化教学方法，能够有效整合初中化学知识，从而形成更为系统化、结构化的知识框架，避免教学内容停留在表面层次。本文简要概述了初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，并提出了运用游戏化教学方法复习化学符号知识的策略。

abstract: 在传统的初中化学复习教学活动中，教师很难将碎片化的知识进行充分整理，学生学习能力和综合素质的提高均受到较大影响。然而，游戏式教学法能够以鲜明的教学主题为核心，有效整合初中化学知识，从而形成更具系统性与结构性的知识框架，避免教学内容始终停留在浅层阶段。本文简要阐述初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，提出以游戏教学法对化学符号的知识进行复习教学的策略。
ZH_EN: In traditional junior high school chemistry review teaching activities, teachers find it difficult to adequately organize fragmented knowledge, which significantly impacts the improvement of students' learning abilities and overall quality. However, game-based teaching methods can effectively integrate junior high school chemistry knowledge around a clear teaching theme, forming a more systematic and structured knowledge framework, thereby avoiding the teaching content from remaining at a superficial level. This article briefly discusses the problems existing in junior high school chemistry review teaching and proposes strategies for using game-based teaching methods to review knowledge of chemical symbols.
EN_ZH: 在传统初中化学复习教学活动中，教师难以充分组织碎片化知识，这对学生学习能力和综合素质的提升产生了显著影响。然而，游戏化教学法能够围绕明确的教学主题，有效整合初中化学知识，形成更为系统化、结构化的知识框架，从而避免教学内容停留在浅表层次。本文简要探讨了初中化学复习教学中存在的问题，并提出了运用游戏化教学法复习化学符号知识的策略。

abstract: 针对近年来矿业开发活动对地球的影响持续增加，当前找矿工作难度加大等问题，本研究探讨了基于矿山地质发掘的地球物理化学联合勘查新技术的应用。利用高精度、高效率、低成本的地球物理化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常的特征，挖掘了地质找矿的潜在规律，并以此指导矿山的寻找和发掘。研究结果显示，这套落地化的勘探方法在提高找矿效率、降低勘查成本与环境破坏上具有显著效果。对于矿山地质资源的研究和找矿工作，提供了新的视角和工具。
ZH_EN: In response to the increasing impact of mining development activities on the Earth in recent years and the growing challenges in mineral exploration, this study explores the application of new geophysical and geochemical joint exploration technologies based on mine geological excavation. Utilizing high-precision, high-efficiency, and low-cost geophysical and geochemical joint exploration methods, the characteristics of geochemical anomalies were studied, and the underlying patterns of geological prospecting were uncovered, guiding the search and excavation of mines. The results show that this practical exploration method significantly improves prospecting efficiency while reducing exploration costs and environmental damage. It provides new perspectives and tools for the study of mine geological resources and prospecting work.
EN_ZH: 针对近年来矿业开发活动对地球影响日益加剧及矿产勘探难度不断增大的问题，本研究基于矿山地质开挖，探索了新型地球物理与地球化学联合勘探技术的应用。通过采用高精度、高效且低成本的地球物理与地球化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常特征，揭示了地质找矿的内在规律，指导了矿山的寻找与开挖。结果表明，这一实用勘探方法在降低勘探成本与环境损害的同时，显著提升了找矿效率，为矿山地质资源研究与找矿工作提供了新的视角与工具。

abstract: 针对近年来矿业开发活动对地球的影响持续增加，当前找矿工作难度加大等问题，本研究探讨了基于矿山地质发掘的地球物理化学联合勘查新技术的应用。利用高精度、高效率、低成本的地球物理化学联合勘探方法，研究了地球化学异常的特征，挖掘了地质找矿的潜在规律，并以此指导矿山的寻找和发掘。研究结果显示，这套落地化的勘探方法在提高找矿效率、降低勘查成本与环境破坏上具有显著效果。对于矿山地质资源的研究和找矿工作，提供了新的视角和工具。
ZH_EN: In response to the increasing impact of mining development activities on the Earth in recent years and the growing challenges in mineral exploration, this study explores the application of new geophysical and geochemical joint exploration technologies based on mine geological excavation. Utilizing high-precision, high-efficiency, and low-cost geophysical and geochemical joint exploration methods, the characteristics of geochemical anomalies were studied, and the underlying patterns of geological prospecting were uncovered, guiding the search and excavation of mines. The results show that this practical exploration method significantly improves prospecting efficiency while reducing exploration costs and environmental damage. It provides new perspectives and tools for the study of mine geological resources and mineral exploration.

Utilizing high-precision, high-efficiency, and low-cost geophysical and geochemical joint exploration methods, the characteristics of geochemical anomalies were studied, and the underlying patterns of geological prospecting were uncovered, guiding the search and excavation of mines. It provides new perspectives and tools for the study of mine geological resources and prospecting work.

abstract: <正>大学生思想政治教育对化学专业就业的影响是一个重要的研究课题。在现代教育中，思想政治教育不仅关乎学生的品德发展，还能在就业竞争中发挥潜在的优势。特别是化学专业，学生除了需要具备扎实的专业知识，还需要具备强烈的社会责任感、创新精神和职业道德。这些正是思想政治教育能够影响的关键因素。通过加强思想政治教育，学生能够更好地理解国家战略需求、环境保护的重要性以及创新驱动发展的必要性，从而在未来的就业市场中拥有更为突出的竞争力。
ZH_EN: The impact of ideological and political education on the employment of chemistry majors is a significant research topic. In modern education, ideological and political education not only pertains to the moral development of students but also plays a potential role in enhancing their competitiveness in the job market. Particularly for chemistry majors, students need not only solid professional knowledge but also a strong sense of social responsibility, innovative spirit, and professional ethics. These are precisely the key factors that ideological and political education can influence. By strengthening ideological and political education, students can better understand the strategic needs of the nation, the importance of environmental protection, and the necessity of innovation-driven development, thereby gaining a more prominent competitive edge in the future job market.
EN_ZH: 思想政治教育对化学专业学生就业的影响是一个重要的研究课题。在现代教育中，思想政治教育不仅关乎学生的道德培养，还在提升其就业竞争力方面具有潜在作用。特别是对于化学专业的学生而言，他们不仅需要扎实的专业知识，还应具备强烈的社会责任感、创新精神和职业道德，这些正是思想政治教育能够影响的关键因素。通过加强思想政治教育，学生能够更好地理解国家的战略需求、环境保护的重要性以及创新驱动发展的必要性，从而在未来就业市场中获得更加突出的竞争优势。

abstract: <正>当下的中国正处于百年未有之大变局，化学教育面临着前所未有的挑战。挑战主要来自于2个方面：一是以大数据和人工智能为标志的信息时代的挑战，数智赋能的化学教育将带来化学教育内容、化学教育方式、化学教育评价等全要素、系统性的变革；二是以创新驱动发展为核心战略的中国式现代化的挑战，如何回应国家重大战略需求，在化学常态课堂上培养学生的创新能力成为化学教育亟待破解的难题。
ZH_EN: China is currently undergoing unprecedented changes, and chemical education is facing challenges like never before. These challenges primarily stem from two aspects: firstly, the challenges of the information age marked by big data and artificial intelligence, where data and intelligence-empowered chemical education will bring comprehensive and systematic reforms to the content, methods, and evaluation of chemical education; secondly, the challenges of Chinese-style modernization with innovation-driven development as its core strategy, and how to respond to the country's major strategic needs, fostering students' innovative abilities in regular chemistry classes has become an urgent problem to be solved in chemical education.
EN_ZH: 中国正经历前所未有的变革，化学教育也面临着前所未有的挑战。这些挑战主要来自两个方面：一是以大数据、人工智能为标志的信息时代的挑战，数据和智能赋能的化学教育将给化学教育的内容、方式和评价带来全面系统的变革；二是以创新驱动发展为核心战略的中国式现代化的挑战，如何回应国家重大战略需求，在常规化学课堂上培养学生的创新能力，已成为化学教育亟待解决的问题。

abstract: 探讨了氨基寡糖素与化学杀菌剂复配对大白菜霜霉病的防治效果。
ZH_EN: The study explored the control efficacy of a combination of amino oligosaccharides and chemical fungicides against downy mildew in Chinese cabbage.
EN_ZH: 该研究探讨了氨基寡糖素与化学杀菌剂组合对白菜霜霉病的防治效果。

abstract: 通过对山西代县阳明堡一带地热田流体化学组分特征及其动态变化和同位素地球化学特征分析研究，全面总结了地热田流体地球化学特征，发现地下热水中所含阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水属弱碱、软水温热水，氟含量达到命名矿泉水浓度，可命名为氟水，具有良好的医疗保健作用，适于洗浴和医疗用水。并在此基础上，对地热田成因进行分析探讨，发现地热田形成距今1.80—1.53万年，热水补给高程大于2000 m，补给来源为恒山区域，水化学类型与大营热矿水类型相似，为理疗热矿水类型，属氟水。
ZH_EN: Through the analysis and study of the chemical composition characteristics, dynamic changes, and isotopic geochemical features of the geothermal field fluids in the Yangmingbao area of Dai County, Shanxi, a comprehensive summary of the geochemical characteristics of the geothermal field fluids was conducted. It was found that the cations in the underground hot water are predominantly Na+, while the anions are mainly Cl- and SO42-. The hot water is weakly alkaline, soft, and warm, with fluoride content reaching the concentration required for naming mineral water, thus it can be classified as fluoride water. It has excellent medical and health benefits and is suitable for bathing and medical use. Based on this, an analysis of the genesis of the geothermal field was conducted, revealing that the geothermal field formed between 18,000 and 15,300 years ago. The recharge elevation of the hot water is greater than 2000 meters, with the recharge source being the Hengshan region. The hydrochemical type is similar to that of the Daying thermal mineral water, classified as therapeutic thermal mineral water, specifically fluoride water.
EN_ZH: 通过对山西代县阳明堡地区地热田流体的化学成分特征、动态变化及同位素地球化学特征的分析研究，综合总结了地热田流体的地球化学特征。发现地下热水的阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水呈弱碱性，为软水、温水，氟含量达到命名矿泉水浓度，故可命名为氟水，具有优良的医疗保健作用，适宜洗浴医疗。在此基础上对地热田成因进行了分析，得出该地热田形成于距今18000~15300年，热水补给高程大于2000米，补给来源为恒山地区，水化学类型与大营热矿水相似，属医疗热矿水，为氟水。

abstract: 通过对山西代县阳明堡一带地热田流体化学组分特征及其动态变化和同位素地球化学特征分析研究，全面总结了地热田流体地球化学特征，发现地下热水中所含阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水属弱碱、软水温热水，氟含量达到命名矿泉水浓度，可命名为氟水，具有良好的医疗保健作用，适于洗浴和医疗用水。并在此基础上，对地热田成因进行分析探讨，发现地热田形成距今1.80—1.53万年，热水补给高程大于2000 m，补给来源为恒山区域，水化学类型与大营热矿水类型相似，为理疗热矿水类型，属氟水。
ZH_EN: Through the analysis and research of the chemical composition characteristics, dynamic changes, and isotopic geochemical features of the geothermal field fluid in the Yangmingbao area of Dai County, Shanxi, a comprehensive summary of the geochemical characteristics of the geothermal field fluid was conducted. It was found that the cations in the underground hot water are predominantly Na+, while the anions are mainly Cl- and SO42-. The hot water is weakly alkaline, soft, and warm, with fluoride content reaching the concentration of named mineral water, thus it can be classified as fluoride water. It has excellent medical and health benefits and is suitable for bathing and medical use. Based on this, the genesis of the geothermal field was analyzed and discussed, revealing that the geothermal field formed between 18,000 and 15,300 years ago. The recharge elevation of the hot water is greater than 2000 meters, with the recharge source being the Hengshan region. The hydrochemical type is similar to that of the Daying thermal mineral water, classified as therapeutic thermal mineral water, specifically fluoride water.
EN_ZH: 通过对山西代县阳明堡地区地热田流体的化学成分特征、动态变化及同位素地球化学特征的分析研究，综合总结了地热田流体的地球化学特征。发现地下热水中阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水呈弱碱性、软、温，氟含量达到命名矿泉水浓度，故可定名为氟水，具有优良的医疗保健作用，适宜洗浴医疗。在此基础上，分析探讨了地热田的成因，得出该地热田形成于距今18000年至15300年之间，热水补给高程大于2000米，补给来源为恒山地区，水化学类型与大营热矿水相似，属医疗热矿水，为氟水。

abstract: 通过对山西代县阳明堡一带地热田流体化学组分特征及其动态变化和同位素地球化学特征分析研究，全面总结了地热田流体地球化学特征，发现地下热水中所含阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水属弱碱、软水温热水，氟含量达到命名矿泉水浓度，可命名为氟水，具有良好的医疗保健作用，适于洗浴和医疗用水。并在此基础上，对地热田成因进行分析探讨，发现地热田形成距今1.80—1.53万年，热水补给高程大于2000 m，补给来源为恒山区域，水化学类型与大营热矿水类型相似，为理疗热矿水类型，属氟水。
ZH_EN: Through the analysis and study of the chemical composition characteristics, dynamic changes, and isotopic geochemical features of the geothermal field fluids in the Yangmingbao area of Dai County, Shanxi, a comprehensive summary of the geochemical characteristics of the geothermal field fluids was conducted. It was found that the cations in the underground hot water are predominantly Na+, while the anions are mainly Cl- and SO42-. The hot water is weakly alkaline, soft, and warm, with fluoride content reaching the concentration required for naming it as mineral water, thus it can be classified as fluoride water. It has excellent medical and health benefits, making it suitable for bathing and medical use. Based on this, an analysis of the genesis of the geothermal field was conducted, revealing that the geothermal field formed between 18,000 and 15,300 years ago. The recharge elevation of the hot water exceeds 2000 meters, with the recharge source being the Hengshan region. The hydrochemical type is similar to that of the Daying thermal mineral water, belonging to the therapeutic thermal mineral water type and classified as fluoride water.
EN_ZH: 通过对山西代县阳明堡地区地热田流体的化学成分特征、动态变化及同位素地球化学特征的分析研究，综合总结了地热田流体的地球化学特征。发现地下热水中的阳离子以Na+为主，阴离子以Cl-和SO42-为主，热水呈弱碱性，属软水、温水，氟含量达到命名矿水浓度，故可定名为氟水，具有优良的医疗保健作用，适宜洗浴医疗。在此基础上，对地热田的成因进行了分析，得出该地热田形成于距今18000年至15300年之间，热水补给高程大于2000米，补给来源为恒山地区，水化学类型与大同市天镇县大营热矿水相似，属医疗热矿水类型，为氟水。

abstract: <正>2024年三季度,全国规模以上工业产能利用率为75.1%,比上年同期下降0.5个百分点,比二季度上升0.2个百分点。分三大门类看, 2024年三季度,采矿业产能利用率为74.6%;制造业产能利用率为75.2%;电力、热力、燃气及水生产和供应业产能利用率为74.3%。分主要行业看, 2024年三季度,煤炭开采和洗选业产能利用率为72.7%,食品制造业为70.7%,纺织业为77.9%,非金属矿物制品业为61.7%,黑色金属冶炼和压延加工业为77.4%,有色金属冶炼和压延加工业为78.4%,通用设备制造业为78.7%,专用设备制造业为75.8%,汽车制造业为73.2%,电气机械和器材制造业为75.6%,
ZH_EN: In the third quarter of 2024, the capacity utilization rate of industrial enterprises above designated size nationwide was 75.1%, a decrease of 0.5 percentage points compared to the same period last year, but an increase of 0.2 percentage points from the second quarter. By major categories, the capacity utilization rate for mining was 74.6%; for manufacturing, it was 75.2%; and for the production and supply of electricity, heat, gas, and water, it was 74.3%. By key industries, the capacity utilization rate for coal mining and washing was 72.7%, for food manufacturing it was 70.7%, for the textile industry it was 77.9%, for non-metallic mineral products it was 61.7%, for ferrous metal smelting and rolling processing it was 77.4%, for non-ferrous metal smelting and rolling processing it was 78.4%, for general equipment manufacturing it was 78.7%, for special equipment manufacturing it was 75.8%, for automobile manufacturing it was 73.2%, and for electrical machinery and equipment manufacturing it was 75.6%.
EN_ZH: 2024年第三季度，全国规模以上工业企业产能利用率为75.1%，比上年同期下降0.5个百分点，比二季度上升0.2个百分点。分三大门类看，采矿业产能利用率为74.6%；制造业产能利用率为75.2%；电力、热力、燃气及水生产和供应业产能利用率为74.3%。分主要行业看，煤炭开采和洗选业产能利用率为72.7%，食品制造业为70.7%，纺织业为77.9%，非金属矿物制品业为61.7%，黑色金属冶炼和压延加工业为77.4%，有色金属冶炼和压延加工业为78.4%，通用设备制造业为78.7%，专用设备制造业为75.8%，汽车制造业为73.2%，电气机械和器材制造业为75.6%。

abstract: 本文选取了有色金属材料中的典型品种，如铝合金、铜合金、钛及钛合金的化学分析取样标准进行研究，通过对比分析上述典型有色金属的化学成分分析取样标准，并结合产品标准中对取样数量的规定，对取样规定存在的差异性进行研究，并针对有色金属材料化学分析取样标准的现状给出了相关的建议。
ZH_EN: This paper selects typical varieties of non-ferrous metal materials, such as aluminum alloys, copper alloys, titanium, and titanium alloys, to study the chemical analysis sampling standards. By comparing and analyzing the chemical composition analysis sampling standards of these typical non-ferrous metals, and combining the sampling quantity requirements in product standards, the differences in sampling regulations are investigated. Relevant suggestions are provided based on the current status of chemical analysis sampling standards for non-ferrous metal materials.
EN_ZH: 本文选取铝合金、铜合金、钛及钛合金等典型有色金属材料，研究其化学分析取样标准。通过对比分析这些典型有色金属的化学成分分析取样标准，并结合产品标准中的取样数量要求，探讨取样规定的差异。根据有色金属材料化学分析取样标准的现状，提出相关建议。

abstract: 林业育苗作为林业生产的核心环节，杂草控制对苗木成长至关重要。化学除草技术因高效、便捷而被广泛采用。本文深入剖析了化学除草技术运作机理及其在林业育苗中实用性，并结合当前应用情况，进一步探讨了技术选择标准、操作方式以及对环境影响考量，旨在为林业育苗的杂草管理工作提供科学理论支撑和实践指导，从而确保育苗的高效与安全。
ZH_EN: Forestry seedling cultivation, as the core link of forestry production, makes weed control crucial for seedling growth. Chemical weed control technology is widely adopted due to its efficiency and convenience. This article thoroughly analyzes the operational mechanisms of chemical weed control technology and its practicality in forestry seedling cultivation. It further explores the criteria for technology selection, operational methods, and considerations of environmental impact based on current application scenarios. The aim is to provide scientific theoretical support and practical guidance for weed management in forestry seedling cultivation, thereby ensuring the efficiency and safety of seedling production.
EN_ZH: 林业育苗作为林业生产的核心环节，杂草防控对苗木生长至关重要。化学除草技术因其高效便捷而被广泛应用。本文深入剖析了化学除草技术的运作机制及其在林业育苗中的实用性，并基于当前应用场景，进一步探讨了技术选择标准、操作方法及环境影响考量，旨在为林业育苗中的杂草管理提供科学的理论支撑与实践指导，从而保障苗木生产的效率与安全。

The aim is to provide scientific theoretical support and practical guidance for weed management in forestry seedling cultivation, thereby ensuring the efficiency and safety of seedling production.

abstract: <正>化学哲学是用哲学思维和方法审视化学学科的本质、性质和发展等方面问题的产物。在化学哲学中,化学是哲学分析的对象;在哲学分类下,化学哲学是科技哲学的一个分支。研究化学哲学不仅是在反思化学的基础和原理,还能够推动化学学科的进步、跨学科的创新,以及科学与社会之间的深度对话。南京师范大学邱道骥教授的《化学哲学概论》是以化学学科为具体研究对象,面向化学专业师生的重要作品。本书从化学的研究对象、研究内容、基本问题出发,深入探讨了化学学科中的基本哲学问题。该书不仅为读者提供了理解化学的全新哲学视角,还对化学在科学哲学中的独特地位做出了详尽的阐释。
ZH_EN: Philosophy of Chemistry is the product of examining the essence, nature, and development of the discipline of chemistry through philosophical thinking and methods. In the philosophy of chemistry, chemistry is the subject of philosophical analysis; under the classification of philosophy, the philosophy of chemistry is a branch of the philosophy of science and technology. Studying the philosophy of chemistry not only involves reflecting on the foundations and principles of chemistry but also promotes the advancement of the discipline, interdisciplinary innovation, and in-depth dialogue between science and society. Professor Qiu Daoji's "Introduction to the Philosophy of Chemistry" from Nanjing Normal University is a significant work aimed at chemistry students and faculty, with the discipline of chemistry as its specific subject of study. Starting from the research objects, content, and fundamental questions of chemistry, the book delves deeply into the basic philosophical issues within the discipline. This book not only provides readers with a fresh philosophical perspective on understanding chemistry but also offers a detailed explanation of the unique position of chemistry in the philosophy of science.
EN_ZH: 化学哲学是通过哲学思维和方法对化学学科的本质、性质和发展进行审视的产物。在化学哲学中，化学是哲学分析的对象；在哲学的分类中，化学哲学是科学技术哲学的一个分支。研究化学哲学不仅是对化学基础与原理的反思，也促进学科进步、跨学科创新以及科学与社会间的深度对话。南京师范大学邱道骥教授的《化学哲学概论》是一部以化学学科为具体研究对象，面向化学专业学生和教师的重要著作。该书从化学的研究对象、内容和基本问题出发，深入探讨了化学学科中的基本哲学问题。本书不仅为读者提供了理解化学的新哲学视角，还详细阐述了化学在科学哲学中的独特地位。

abstract: 如今互联网的应用已经不再局限在计算机端，随着科技的不断发展，移动互联平台已成为主流，学生可以通过移动端进行线上线下的学习互动，学习更加便捷。将移动互联平台应用在高中化学教学中，可以让课堂教学模式更加高效，也让学生在互联网技术的支持下加深对化学知识的了解，让化学学习变得更加直观、生动、有趣。
ZH_EN: Nowadays, the application of the internet is no longer limited to computers. With the continuous advancement of technology, mobile internet platforms have become mainstream. Students can engage in online and offline learning interactions through mobile devices, making learning more convenient. Applying mobile internet platforms to high school chemistry teaching can make classroom instruction more efficient. It also allows students to deepen their understanding of chemistry knowledge with the support of internet technology, making chemistry learning more intuitive, vivid, and interesting.
EN_ZH: 如今，互联网的应用已不再局限于电脑。随着技术的不断进步，移动互联网平台已成为主流。学生可以通过移动设备进行线上线下的学习互动，使学习更加便捷。将移动互联网平台应用于高中化学教学中，可以使课堂教学更加高效。同时，在互联网技术的支持下，学生能够加深对化学知识的理解，使化学学习更加直观、生动、有趣。

abstract: 为了推进新课标改革，在中学化学教学中，要将信息技术与中学化学教学相结合，这样能使课堂变得有趣，满足学生个性化发展需求，建设有效的课堂。信息技术改变了原有的教学模式，教师借助信息技术的多种手段实施课堂教学，使教学环境和课堂结构得到充实和优化，突破教学重难点，促进学生深度学习，发展学生的核心素养，提升学生的自主学习能力和教师的教学效率。因此，在数字化时代背景下，化学教师要强化信息技术和学科教学的结合和运用，打造素养化课堂，充分发挥信息技术在教学中的价值。
ZH_EN: To advance the new curriculum reform, it is essential to integrate information technology with middle school chemistry teaching. This approach can make classes more engaging, meet the personalized development needs of students, and build effective classrooms. Information technology has transformed traditional teaching methods, enabling teachers to use various technological tools to enrich and optimize the teaching environment and classroom structure. This helps overcome key teaching challenges, promote deep learning among students, develop their core competencies, and enhance both students' self-directed learning abilities and teachers' instructional efficiency. Therefore, in the context of the digital era, chemistry teachers must strengthen the integration and application of information technology in subject teaching, create competency-oriented classrooms, and fully leverage the value of information technology in education.
EN_ZH: 推进新课程改革，必须将信息技术与中学化学教学相融合，使课堂更具趣味性，满足学生个性化发展需求，构建高效课堂。信息技术改变了传统教学方式，使教师能够运用多种技术手段丰富和优化教学环境与课堂结构，有助于攻克教学重难点，促进学生深度学习，发展核心素养，提升学生自主学习能力与教师教学效率。因此，在数字化时代背景下，化学教师必须加强信息技术在学科教学中的融合与应用，打造素养导向的课堂，充分发挥信息技术的教育价值。

abstract: 为了推进新课标改革，在中学化学教学中，要将信息技术与中学化学教学相结合，这样能使课堂变得有趣，满足学生个性化发展需求，建设有效的课堂。信息技术改变了原有的教学模式，教师借助信息技术的多种手段实施课堂教学，使教学环境和课堂结构得到充实和优化，突破教学重难点，促进学生深度学习，发展学生的核心素养，提升学生的自主学习能力和教师的教学效率。因此，在数字化时代背景下，化学教师要强化信息技术和学科教学的结合和运用，打造素养化课堂，充分发挥信息技术在教学中的价值。
ZH_EN: To advance the reform of the new curriculum standards, it is essential to integrate information technology with secondary school chemistry teaching. This approach can make classes more engaging, meet the personalized development needs of students, and build effective classrooms. Information technology has transformed traditional teaching models, enabling teachers to enrich and optimize the teaching environment and classroom structure through various technological tools. This helps overcome key teaching challenges, promotes deep learning among students, develops their core competencies, and enhances both students' self-directed learning abilities and teachers' instructional efficiency. Therefore, in the context of the digital era, chemistry teachers should strengthen the integration and application of information technology in subject teaching, create competency-based classrooms, and fully leverage the value of information technology in education.
EN_ZH: 推进新课标改革，需将信息技术与中学化学教学相融合，使课堂更具趣味性，满足学生个性化发展需求，构建有效课堂。信息技术改变了传统教学模式，教师可借助多种技术手段丰富和优化教学环境与课堂结构，以此突破教学重难点，促进学生深度学习，发展核心素养，既提升学生自主学习能力，又提高教师教学效率。因此，在数字化时代背景下，化学教师应加强信息技术在学科教学中的融合应用，打造素养课堂，充分发挥信息技术的教育价值。

abstract: 为了推进新课标改革，在中学化学教学中，要将信息技术与中学化学教学相结合，这样能使课堂变得有趣，满足学生个性化发展需求，建设有效的课堂。信息技术改变了原有的教学模式，教师借助信息技术的多种手段实施课堂教学，使教学环境和课堂结构得到充实和优化，突破教学重难点，促进学生深度学习，发展学生的核心素养，提升学生的自主学习能力和教师的教学效率。因此，在数字化时代背景下，化学教师要强化信息技术和学科教学的结合和运用，打造素养化课堂，充分发挥信息技术在教学中的价值。
ZH_EN: To advance the reform of the new curriculum standards, it is essential to integrate information technology with middle school chemistry teaching. This approach can make classes more engaging, meet the personalized development needs of students, and build effective classrooms. Information technology has transformed traditional teaching models, enabling teachers to enrich and optimize the teaching environment and classroom structure through various technological means. This helps overcome key teaching challenges, promote deep learning among students, develop their core competencies, and enhance both students' self-directed learning abilities and teachers' instructional efficiency. Therefore, in the context of the digital era, chemistry teachers must strengthen the integration and application of information technology in subject teaching, create competency-oriented classrooms, and fully leverage the value of information technology in education.
EN_ZH: 推进新课程标准的改革，必须将信息技术与中学化学教学相结合，使课堂更具吸引力，满足学生的个性化发展需求，构建高效课堂。信息技术改变了传统的教学模式，使教师能够通过各种技术手段丰富和优化教学环境和课堂结构。这有助于克服教学中的关键挑战，促进学生深度学习，发展其核心素养，并提升学生的自主学习能力和教师的教学效率。因此，在数字化时代背景下，化学教师必须加强信息技术在学科教学中的整合与应用，打造以素养为导向的课堂，充分发挥信息技术在教育中的价值。

abstract: <正>化学知识具有实验性、微观性、抽象性特征，传统讲授方式学生难以理解，易产生反感情绪。短视频集图文、影音、动画于一体，并凭借直观、动态、趣味等优点，为高中化学教学提供了有益补充。短视频在高中化学教学中的应用有重要意义。教师要重视短视频的应用，更新观念，转变教法，充分发挥短视频的辅助教学最大功用，提升教学效益。一、短视频助力高中化学教学的意义（一）变被动听讲为主动学习高中化学课堂知识点多、琐碎、理论性强，学习难度大。如果教师单纯地讲授，学生就处于被动学习的状态，难免分心走神，影响课堂教学效率。
ZH_EN:
Chemical knowledge is characterized by its experimental, microscopic, and abstract nature, making it difficult for students to understand through traditional teaching methods, which can easily lead to disinterest. Short videos, integrating text, images, audio, and animation, offer an intuitive, dynamic, and engaging approach, providing a valuable supplement to high school chemistry education. The application of short videos in high school chemistry teaching holds significant importance. Teachers should emphasize the use of short videos, update their perspectives, transform teaching methods, and fully leverage the auxiliary teaching potential of short videos to enhance teaching effectiveness. 

1. The Significance of Short Videos in Assisting High School Chemistry Teaching  
   (1) Transforming Passive Listening into Active Learning  
   High school chemistry classes are filled with numerous, fragmented, and highly theoretical concepts, making learning challenging. If teachers rely solely on lectures, students remain in a passive learning state, prone to distraction, which negatively impacts classroom efficiency.
EN_ZH:
化学知识具有实验性、微观性和抽象性的特点，学生通过传统的教学方式难以理解，容易产生厌学情绪。短视频集文字、图像、音频和动画于一体，直观、动态、有趣，为高中化学教学提供了有益的补充。短视频在高中化学教学中的应用具有重要意义。教师应重视短视频的使用，更新观念，转变教学方式，充分发挥短视频的辅助教学潜力，提高教学效果。

1. 短视频辅助高中化学教学的意义  
   （1）变被动听讲为主动学习  
   高中化学课堂知识点繁多、零碎且理论性强，学习难度较大。如果教师单纯依靠讲授，学生始终处于被动学习状态，容易走神，影响课堂效率。

Short videos, integrating text, images, audio, and animation, offer an intuitive, dynamic, and engaging approach, providing a valuable supplement to high school chemistry education. The application of short videos in high school chemistry teaching is of significant importance. Teachers should emphasize the use of short videos, update their perspectives, transform teaching methods, and fully leverage the auxiliary teaching functions of short videos to enhance teaching effectiveness. 

1. The Significance of Short Videos in Assisting High School Chemistry Teaching  
   (1) Transforming Passive Listening into Active Learning  
   High school chemistry classes often involve numerous, fragmented, and highly theoretical concepts, making learning challenging. If teachers rely solely on lectures, students remain in a passive learning state, prone to distraction and reduced classroom efficiency.
EN_ZH:
化学知识具有实验性、微观性和抽象性的特点，学生通过传统的教学方式难以理解，容易产生厌学情绪。短视频集文字、图像、音频、动画于一体，直观、动态、有趣，为高中化学教学提供了有益的补充。短视频在高中化学教学中的应用具有重要意义。教师应重视短视频的使用，更新观念，转变教学方式，充分发挥短视频的辅助教学功能，提高教学效果。

1. 短视频辅助高中化学教学的意义  
   (1) 变被动听讲为主动学习  
   高中化学课程内容多、知识点零碎且理论性强，学生学习难度大。如果教师单纯采用讲授法，学生始终处于被动学习状态，容易走神，课堂效率低下。

abstract: <正>化学知识具有实验性、微观性、抽象性特征，传统讲授方式学生难以理解，易产生反感情绪。短视频集图文、影音、动画于一体，并凭借直观、动态、趣味等优点，为高中化学教学提供了有益补充。短视频在高中化学教学中的应用有重要意义。教师要重视短视频的应用，更新观念，转变教法，充分发挥短视频的辅助教学最大功用，提升教学效益。一、短视频助力高中化学教学的意义（一）变被动听讲为主动学习高中化学课堂知识点多、琐碎、理论性强，学习难度大。如果教师单纯地讲授，学生就处于被动学习的状态，难免分心走神，影响课堂教学效率。
ZH_EN:
Chemical knowledge is characterized by its experimental, microscopic, and abstract nature, making it difficult for students to understand through traditional teaching methods, often leading to disinterest. Short videos, integrating text, images, audio, and animation, offer an intuitive, dynamic, and engaging approach, providing a valuable supplement to high school chemistry education. The application of short videos in high school chemistry teaching holds significant importance. Teachers should emphasize the use of short videos, update their teaching philosophies, and adapt their methods to fully leverage the auxiliary teaching potential of short videos, thereby enhancing teaching effectiveness. 

1. The Significance of Short Videos in Assisting High School Chemistry Teaching  
   (1) Transforming Passive Listening into Active Learning  
   High school chemistry classes are dense with numerous, fragmented, and highly theoretical concepts, posing significant learning challenges. If teachers rely solely on lectures, students remain in a passive learning state, prone to distraction and reduced classroom efficiency.
EN_ZH:
化学知识具有实验性、微观性和抽象性的特点，学生通过传统的教学方式难以理解，往往导致学习兴趣不高。短视频集文字、图像、音频和动画于一体，具有直观、动态和趣味性强的特点，为高中化学教学提供了宝贵的补充。短视频在高中化学教学中的应用具有重要意义。教师应重视短视频的使用，更新教学理念，调整教学方法，充分发挥短视频的辅助教学潜力，从而提高教学效果。

1. 短视频辅助高中化学教学的意义  
   （1）变被动听讲为主动学习  
   高中化学课程内容密集，知识点繁多且碎片化，理论性强，学习难度较大。如果教师仅依赖讲授式教学，学生将处于被动学习状态，容易分心，课堂效率降低。

abstract: 文章针对当前创新创业教育与有机化学教学的现状，提出了一系列改革策略，旨在融合创新创业教育理念，提升学生的创新思维和实践能力。通过优化课程内容，引入真实情境和项目式学习，鼓励学生主动探究，培养解决实际问题的能力。同时，改革强调团队协作与跨学科交流，以增强学生的综合素质。教学方法上，采用翻转课堂与混合式教学，激发学生学习兴趣，提高教学效果。改革后的教学评价体系兼顾知识掌握与创新能力，通过形成性评价和展示性评价，全方位评估学生的学习进步。通过案例研究和对比分析，展示了改革在提升学生有机化学知识理解、创新思维培养及创业能力方面所取得的显著成效。未来，将持续探索有机化学教学与创新创业教育的深度融合，以期为高等教育改革提供借鉴。
ZH_EN: The article addresses the current state of innovation and entrepreneurship education and organic chemistry teaching, proposing a series of reform strategies aimed at integrating the concepts of innovation and entrepreneurship education to enhance students' innovative thinking and practical abilities. By optimizing course content, introducing real-world scenarios and project-based learning, and encouraging active student inquiry, the reform seeks to cultivate the ability to solve practical problems. Additionally, the reform emphasizes teamwork and interdisciplinary communication to enhance students' comprehensive qualities. In terms of teaching methods, flipped classrooms and blended learning are adopted to stimulate student interest and improve teaching effectiveness. The reformed teaching evaluation system balances knowledge acquisition and innovation capabilities, using formative and demonstrative assessments to comprehensively evaluate students' learning progress. Through case studies and comparative analysis, the article demonstrates the significant achievements of the reform in enhancing students' understanding of organic chemistry, fostering innovative thinking, and developing entrepreneurial skills. In the future, continuous exploration of the deep integration of organic chemistry teaching and innovation and entrepreneurship education will provide insights for higher education reform.
EN_ZH: 文章针对当前创新创业教育与有机化学教学的现状，提出了一系列改革策略，旨在通过融入创新创业教育理念，提升学生的创新思维和实践能力。通过优化课程内容、引入实际情境和项目式学习，并鼓励学生主动探究，改革旨在培养解决实际问题的能力。此外，改革还注重团队合作和跨学科交流，以提升学生的综合素质。在教学方法上，采用翻转课堂和混合式学习，激发学生兴趣并提高教学效果。改革后的教学评价体系兼顾知识掌握与创新能力，通过形成性评价和展示性评价，全面评估学生的学习进展。通过案例分析和对比研究，文章展示了改革在提升学生对有机化学的理解、培养创新思维和创业能力方面取得的显著成效。未来，将持续探索有机化学教学与创新创业教育的深度融合，为高等教育改革提供借鉴。

ZH_EN: The article addresses the current state of innovation and entrepreneurship education and organic chemistry teaching, proposing a series of reform strategies aimed at integrating the concepts of innovation and entrepreneurship education to enhance students' innovative thinking and practical abilities. By optimizing course content, introducing real-world scenarios and project-based learning, and encouraging active student inquiry, the reforms aim to cultivate problem-solving skills. Additionally, the reforms emphasize teamwork and interdisciplinary communication to enhance students' overall competencies. In terms of teaching methods, flipped classrooms and blended learning are adopted to stimulate student interest and improve teaching effectiveness. The reformed teaching evaluation system balances knowledge acquisition and innovation capabilities, using formative and summative assessments to comprehensively evaluate student progress. Through case studies and comparative analysis, the article demonstrates the significant achievements of the reforms in improving students' understanding of organic chemistry, fostering innovative thinking, and developing entrepreneurial skills. In the future, continuous exploration of the deep integration of organic chemistry teaching and innovation and entrepreneurship education will provide insights for higher education reform.

ZH_EN: The article addresses the current state of innovation and entrepreneurship education and organic chemistry teaching, proposing a series of reform strategies aimed at integrating the concepts of innovation and entrepreneurship education to enhance students' innovative thinking and practical abilities. By optimizing course content, introducing real-world scenarios and project-based learning, students are encouraged to actively explore and develop problem-solving skills. The reforms also emphasize teamwork and interdisciplinary communication to strengthen students' comprehensive qualities. In terms of teaching methods, flipped classrooms and blended learning are adopted to stimulate students' interest and improve teaching effectiveness. The reformed teaching evaluation system balances knowledge mastery and innovation capabilities, using formative and showcase evaluations to comprehensively assess students' learning progress. Through case studies and comparative analysis, the article demonstrates the significant achievements of the reforms in enhancing students' understanding of organic chemistry, fostering innovative thinking, and developing entrepreneurial skills. In the future, continuous exploration of the deep integration of organic chemistry teaching and innovation and entrepreneurship education will provide valuable insights for higher education reform.

abstract: <正>在当代科技与工业发展中，精确与高效的化学分析方法是基础和关键。分析化学作为科学研究的重要分支，方法精确性直接影响到材料科学、生物医药、环境监测等多个领域的研究成果与工业生产的质量控制。随着信息化技术的不断发展，信息化分析系统在分析化学中的应用已从简单的数据处理扩展到整个分析流程的管理与优化。
ZH_EN: In contemporary technological and industrial development, precise and efficient chemical analysis methods are fundamental and crucial. As a significant branch of scientific research, the accuracy of analytical chemistry directly impacts research outcomes in fields such as materials science, biomedicine, environmental monitoring, and the quality control of industrial production. With the continuous advancement of information technology, the application of information-based analysis systems in analytical chemistry has expanded from simple data processing to the management and optimization of the entire analysis process.
EN_ZH: 在当代科技与工业发展中，精确且高效的化学分析方法至关重要，是基础且关键的一环。作为科学研究的重要分支，分析化学的准确性直接影响着材料科学、生物医药、环境监测等领域的研究成果以及工业生产的质量控制。随着信息技术的不断进步，信息化分析系统在分析化学中的应用已从简单的数据处理扩展至整个分析过程的管理与优化。

abstract: <正>《化学工程与装备》是国家新闻出版署批准出版,公开发行的化工类学术期刊,已被中国学术期刊综合评价数据库(CAJCED)、中国期刊全文数据库(CJFD)收录。本刊由福建石油化工集团有限责任公司主管、福建省化学工业科学技术研究所主办,于1972年创刊,月刊,每月25日出刊。
ZH_EN: "Chemical Engineering and Equipment" is an academic journal in the field of chemical engineering approved for publication by the National Press and Publication Administration and publicly distributed. It has been included in the China Academic Journal Comprehensive Evaluation Database (CAJCED) and the China Journal Full-text Database (CJFD). The journal is supervised by Fujian Petrochemical Group Co., Ltd. and sponsored by the Fujian Institute of Chemical Industry Science and Technology. It was established in 1972, is published monthly, and is released on the 25th of each month.
EN_ZH: 《化学工程与装备》是由国家新闻出版总署批准出版、公开发行的化学工程领域学术期刊，已被中国学术期刊综合评价数据库（CAJCED）和中国期刊全文数据库（CJFD）收录。该刊由福建石化集团公司主管，福建省化工科学技术研究所主办，创刊于1972年，月刊，每月25日出版。

abstract: 随着互联网的应用普及和教育信息化的持续推进，网络教学资源的应用愈发广泛，为教学活动的改革创新做出了重要贡献。而在初中化学教学中，网络教学资源的应用能够开阔学生思维、转换教师的教学理念，为后续初中化学的高效开展提供助力。基于此，本文对初中化学网络教学资源的应用进行研究，对网络资源在探究新知、实验及复习等课程环节中的应用进行探讨，以期充分发挥网络教学资源的作用，促进学生化学核心素养的有效发展。
ZH_EN: With the widespread application of the internet and the continuous advancement of educational informatization, the use of online teaching resources has become increasingly extensive, making significant contributions to the innovation and reform of teaching activities. In junior high school chemistry education, the application of online teaching resources can broaden students' thinking, transform teachers' teaching concepts, and provide support for the efficient implementation of subsequent chemistry education. Based on this, this paper studies the application of online teaching resources in junior high school chemistry, exploring their use in discovering new knowledge, experiments, and review sessions, aiming to fully leverage the role of online teaching resources and promote the effective development of students' core chemistry competencies.
EN_ZH: 随着互联网的广泛应用和教育信息化的不断推进，网络教学资源的运用日益广泛，为教学活动的创新与改革作出了重要贡献。在初中化学教学中，网络教学资源的应用能够拓宽学生的思维，转变教师的教学观念，为后续化学教育的高效开展提供支持。基于此，本文研究了网络教学资源在初中化学中的应用，探索其在新知发现、实验教学和复习环节中的运用，旨在充分发挥网络教学资源的作用，促进学生化学核心素养的有效发展。

abstract: <正>在立德树人的教育根本宗旨下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘与利用红色文化资源，以培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义接班人。高校化学专业要对学生开展党史教育活动，培养他们的红色文化意识，让红色文化扎根于学生心田，使他们能够从中汲取精神营养，从而获得良好的思想品质、树立正确的价值观念。
ZH_EN: Under the fundamental educational principle of fostering virtue and cultivating talents, the state vigorously supports universities in fully exploring and utilizing red cultural resources to cultivate well-rounded socialist successors with moral, intellectual, physical, aesthetic, and labor development. Chemistry programs in universities should carry out Party history education activities for students, fostering their awareness of red culture, allowing red culture to take root in their hearts, enabling them to draw spiritual nourishment from it, and thereby developing good moral character and establishing correct values.
EN_ZH: 在立德树人的根本教育方针下，国家大力支持高校充分挖掘和利用红色文化资源，培养德智体美劳全面发展的社会主义接班人。高校化学专业应开展学生党史教育活动，培养他们的红色文化意识，让红色文化在心中扎根，从中汲取精神养分，从而培养良好品德，树立正确价值观。

abstract: <正>为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量,部分授课者逐渐开始丰富该课程的授课体系,探索多样化教学方法在课堂上的运用效果,力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《真实情境下素养为本的高中化学教学策略》一书主要讲述了多种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的运用效果,详细列举了情景教学法运用于该课程教学活动中的益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂上,授课者通常采用灌输式教学模式完成课程的授课活动,在面对面的教学过程中为求学者讲解相应的化学知识内容,通过这种教学模式的开展虽然能够有效加深求学者对知识的熟悉程度,但却不利于求学者学习兴趣的提升,为了进一步提升求学者在课堂上与授课者的互动频率,授课者需要革新当下的教学体系,构建多层次授课模式,联合运用多种教学方式优化当下的教学方式,增加课堂的趣味性,提高求学者的学习欲望。
ZH_EN: To further enhance the quality of high school chemistry classroom teaching, some educators have gradually begun to enrich the course's teaching system, exploring the effectiveness of diverse teaching methods in the classroom, aiming to provide students with a richer learning experience. The book *"High School Chemistry Teaching Strategies Based on Competency in Real-Life Contexts"* primarily discusses the application effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry classrooms, detailing the benefits of using scenario-based teaching methods in course activities. In traditional high school chemistry classrooms, educators often adopt a lecture-based teaching model to deliver course content, explaining relevant chemical knowledge to learners through face-to-face instruction. While this teaching approach can effectively deepen learners' familiarity with the material, it is not conducive to fostering their interest in learning. To further increase the frequency of interaction between learners and educators in the classroom, educators need to innovate the current teaching system, construct a multi-level teaching model, and integrate various teaching methods to optimize the current approach, enhance classroom engagement, and boost learners' desire to learn.
EN_ZH: 为进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量，部分教育工作者逐渐开始丰富课程教学体系，探究多元化教学方式在课堂中的运用成效，旨在为学生提供更为丰富的学习体验。《基于素养的高中化学真实情境教学策略》一书主要探讨了多种教学方式在高中化学课堂中的运用效果，详细阐述了在课程活动中运用情境教学法的益处。在传统的高中化学课堂中，教育工作者通常采用讲授式教学模式进行课程内容的讲授，通过面对面授课的方式为学习者讲解相关化学知识。这种教学方式虽然能够有效加深学习者对课程内容的熟悉程度，但不利于培养学习者的学习兴趣。为进一步增加学习者与教育工作者在课堂中的互动频率，教育工作者需要对当前的教学体系进行创新，构建多层次教学模式，融合多种教学方式对当前的教学方式进行优化，提升课堂参与度，增强学习者的学习欲望。

abstract: <正>为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量,部分授课者逐渐开始丰富该课程的授课体系,探索多样化教学方法在课堂上的运用效果,力求为学生带来更丰富的学习体验。《真实情境下素养为本的高中化学教学策略》一书主要讲述了多种教学方法在高中化学教学课堂中的运用效果,详细列举了情景教学法运用于该课程教学活动中的益处。在传统高中化学教学课堂上,授课者通常采用灌输式教学模式完成课程的授课活动,在面对面的教学过程中为求学者讲解相应的化学知识内容,通过这种教学模式的开展虽然能够有效加深求学者对知识的熟悉程度,但却不利于求学者学习兴趣的提升,为了进一步提升求学者在课堂上与授课者的互动频率,授课者需要革新当下的教学体系,构建多层次授课模式,联合运用多种教学方式优化当下的教学方式,增加课堂的趣味性,提高求学者的学习欲望。
ZH_EN: In order to further enhance the quality of high school chemistry classroom teaching, some educators have gradually begun to enrich the course's teaching system, exploring the effectiveness of diverse teaching methods in the classroom, aiming to provide students with a richer learning experience. The book "High School Chemistry Teaching Strategies Based on Competency in Real-Life Contexts" primarily discusses the application effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry classrooms, detailing the benefits of using situational teaching methods in the course's instructional activities. In traditional high school chemistry classrooms, educators typically employ a lecture-based teaching model to deliver course content, explaining relevant chemical knowledge to students during face-to-face instruction. While this teaching approach can effectively deepen students' familiarity with the material, it is not conducive to fostering their interest in learning. To further increase the frequency of interaction between students and educators in the classroom, educators need to innovate the current teaching system, construct a multi-level teaching model, and combine various teaching methods to optimize the current instructional approach, enhance classroom engagement, and boost students' desire to learn.
EN_ZH: 为了进一步提升高中化学课堂教学质量，部分教育工作者逐渐开始丰富课程的教学体系，探索多元化教学方式在课堂中的应用效果，旨在为学生提供更为丰富的学习体验。《基于生活化情境素养的高中化学教学策略》一书主要探讨了多种教学方式在高中化学课堂中的应用效果，详细阐述了在课程教学活动中应用情境教学法的好处。在传统的高中化学课堂中，教育工作者通常采用讲授式教学模式来开展课程内容，在面对面授课时为学生们讲解相关的化学知识。这种教学方式虽然能够有效加深学生对课程内容的熟悉程度，但不利于培养学生的学习兴趣。为了进一步提升学生与教育工作者在课堂中的互动频率，教育工作者需要创新当前的教学体系，构建多层次的教学模式，结合多种教学方式优化当前的教学方式，提升课堂的活跃度，增强学生的学习欲望。

ZH_EN: In order to further enhance the quality of high school chemistry classroom teaching, some educators have gradually begun to enrich the course's teaching system, exploring the effectiveness of diverse teaching methods in the classroom, striving to provide students with a richer learning experience. The book "High School Chemistry Teaching Strategies Based on Competency in Real Contexts" primarily discusses the application effects of various teaching methods in high school chemistry classrooms, detailing the benefits of using situational teaching methods in the course's instructional activities. abstract: <正>近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料产业快速发展，关键技术不断突破，产品品种日益丰富，正在进入新质发展的新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，2024年中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会年会在安徽合肥召开。会议介绍了2024年我国生物基化学纤维及原料的发展，针对企业普遍存在的问题探讨解决办法，并对下一步发展提出了规划和方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书处杨菲菲介绍了产业发展情况、分会2024开展的工作以及未来计划。
ZH_EN: In recent years, the bio-based chemical fiber and raw material industry has experienced rapid development, with continuous breakthroughs in key technologies and an increasingly diverse range of products, entering a new track of high-quality development. Against this backdrop, the 2024 Annual Meeting of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Materials Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Association was held in Hefei, Anhui, on September 25. The meeting outlined the development of China's bio-based chemical fibers and raw materials in 2024, discussed solutions to common issues faced by enterprises, and proposed plans and directions for future development. Yang Feifei, Secretary of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Materials Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Association, presented an overview of the industry's development, the branch's 2024 initiatives, and future plans.
EN_ZH: 近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料产业发展迅速，关键技术不断突破，产品种类日益丰富，进入高质量发展新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会2024年年会在安徽合肥召开。会议勾勒出2024年我国生物基化学纤维及原料的发展图景，探讨了企业面临的共性问题的解决方案，并对未来发展提出了规划与方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书长杨飞飞作了行业发展概况、分会2024年工作及未来计划的报告。

Yang Feifei, Secretary of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Materials Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Association, presented an overview of the industry's development, the branch's work in 2024, and future plans.
EN_ZH: 近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料产业发展迅速，关键技术不断突破，产品种类日益丰富，迈入高质量发展新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会2024年年会在安徽合肥召开。会议勾勒了2024年我国生物基化学纤维及原料的发展图景，探讨了企业面临的共性问题的解决方案，并提出了未来发展的规划与方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书长杨飞飞介绍了行业发展概况、分会2024年工作及未来规划。

abstract: <正>近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料产业快速发展，关键技术不断突破，产品品种日益丰富，正在进入新质发展的新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，2024年中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会年会在安徽合肥召开。会议介绍了2024年我国生物基化学纤维及原料的发展，针对企业普遍存在的问题探讨解决办法，并对下一步发展提出了规划和方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书处杨菲菲介绍了产业发展情况、分会2024开展的工作以及未来计划。
ZH_EN: In recent years, the bio-based chemical fiber and raw material industry has experienced rapid development, with continuous breakthroughs in key technologies and an increasingly diverse range of products, entering a new track of high-quality development. Against this backdrop, the 2024 Annual Meeting of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Materials Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Association was held in Hefei, Anhui, on September 25. The meeting outlined the development of bio-based chemical fibers and raw materials in China for 2024, discussed solutions to common issues faced by enterprises, and proposed plans and directions for future development. Yang Feifei, Secretary of the Bio-based Chemical Fiber and Raw Materials Branch of the China Chemical Fiber Association, presented an overview of the industry's development, the branch's 2024 initiatives, and future plans.
EN_ZH: 近年来，生物基化学纤维及原料产业发展迅速，关键技术不断突破，产品种类日益丰富，迈入高质量发展新赛道。在此背景下，9月25日，中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会2024年年会在安徽合肥召开。会议梳理了2024年我国生物基化学纤维及原料的发展情况，探讨了企业面临的共性问题的解决方案，并提出了未来发展的规划与方向。中国化学纤维工业协会生物基化学纤维及原料分会秘书长杨飞飞介绍了行业发展概况、分会2024年工作及未来计划。

abstract: <正>在新时代的背景下，教育不仅是知识的传递，更是价值观的塑造和传播。随着“思政课”概念的不断深入人心，将思想政治教育融入专业课程已成为教学改革的一个重要方向。《有机化学课程思政案例》一书探讨了有机化学与思政教育相结合的创新路径，不仅有助于提升学生的专业素养，还能培养他们的社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现全方位人才培养的目标。
ZH_EN: In the context of the new era, education is not only the transmission of knowledge but also the shaping and dissemination of values. With the concept of "ideological and political education" becoming increasingly ingrained, integrating ideological and political education into specialized courses has become an important direction in teaching reform. The book "Ideological and Political Case Studies in Organic Chemistry" explores innovative approaches to combining organic chemistry with ideological and political education. This not only helps enhance students' professional competence but also cultivates their sense of social responsibility and historical mission, thereby achieving the goal of comprehensive talent development.
EN_ZH: 新时代背景下，教育不仅是知识的传递，更是价值观的塑造与传播。随着“课程思政”理念的日益深入人心，将思想政治教育融入专业课程已成为教学改革的重要方向。《有机化学课程思政案例集》一书探索了有机化学与思政教育相结合的创新路径，不仅有助于提升学生的专业素养，更能培养其社会责任感和历史使命感，从而实现全面育人的目标。

abstract: <正>足球是世界上第一大运动，足球运动员的体能素质直接影响到训练成效和比赛结果，而且在运动过程中，运动员的体能消耗非常大，须采用合适的手段提升足球运动员的体能素质。随着运动生物化学学科的发展，科研人员发现采用科学、有效的营养措施，能够很好地提升足球运动员的体能素质，提高其训练效率和比赛成绩。一、足球运动及其供能特点（一）足球运动足球是一项技能主导类同场竞技性运动，在场上需要运动员之间的密切配合，运动时间长、体力消耗也比较大。其主要有以下几个特点：1.耐力性。足球比赛时长为90 min，运动员需要保持高强度的跑动。2.灵敏性。运动员要根据赛场上的情况作出适当的调整，比如攻防转换、守门员扑救等，所以需要拥有较强的观察能力和位移能力。3.爆发性。要想突破对手、抢断球以及射门，往往需要运动员拥有足够强的爆发力。
ZH_EN:
Football is the world's largest sport, and the physical fitness of football players directly affects training effectiveness and match outcomes. During the game, players experience significant physical exertion, necessitating appropriate methods to enhance their physical fitness. With the development of sports biochemistry, researchers have discovered that scientific and effective nutritional measures can greatly improve the physical fitness of football players, enhancing their training efficiency and match performance.  

### I. Football and Its Energy Supply Characteristics  
#### (1) Football  
Football is a skill-dominated team sport that requires close coordination among players on the field. It involves long durations of play and considerable physical exertion. It has the following key characteristics:  
1. **Endurance**: A football match lasts 90 minutes, requiring players to maintain high-intensity running.  
2. **Agility**: Players must make appropriate adjustments based on the situation on the field, such as transitioning between offense and defense or goalkeeping saves, necessitating strong observational and movement abilities.  
3. **Explosiveness**: To break through opponents, intercept the ball, or score, players often need sufficient explosive power.
EN_ZH:
足球是世界第一大运动，足球运动员的身体素质直接影响训练效果和比赛结果。在比赛过程中，运动员的身体消耗较大，需要采取适当的方法增强运动员的身体素质。随着运动生物化学的发展，研究人员发现，科学有效的营养措施可以极大提高足球运动员的身体素质，提高训练效率和比赛成绩。

### 一、足球及其供能特点  
#### （一）足球  
足球是一项以技术为主的团队运动，需要场上球员的密切配合，运动时间较长，身体消耗较大。它具有以下主要特点：  
1. **耐力性**：足球比赛时长为90分钟，需要运动员保持高强度的奔跑。  
2. **灵敏性**：运动员需要根据场上情况做出适当调整，如攻防转换、守门扑救等，需要较强的观察能力和移动能力。  
3. **爆发性**：为了突破对手、抢断足球或射门得分，运动员往往需要具备足够的爆发力。

During the game, players experience significant physical exertion, necessitating appropriate methods to enhance their physical fitness. With the development of sports biochemistry, researchers have found that scientific and effective nutritional measures can greatly improve the physical fitness of football players, enhancing their training efficiency and match performance.  

### I. Football and Its Energy Supply Characteristics  
#### (1) Football  
Football is a skill-dominated, same-field competitive sport that requires close coordination among players on the field. It involves long durations of play and considerable physical exertion. It has the following key characteristics:  
1. **Endurance**: A football match lasts 90 minutes, requiring players to maintain high-intensity running.  
2. **Agility**: Players must make appropriate adjustments based on the situation on the field, such as transitioning between offense and defense or goalkeeping saves, necessitating strong observational and movement abilities.  
3. **Explosiveness**: Breaking through opponents, intercepting the ball, and shooting often require players to possess sufficient explosive power.
EN_ZH:
足球是世界上最大的运动项目，足球运动员的体能直接影响训练效果和比赛结果。在比赛中，运动员的体能消耗较大，需要采取适当的方法来增强运动员的体能。随着运动生物化学的发展，研究人员发现，科学有效的营养措施可以大大提高足球运动员的体能，提高训练效率和比赛成绩。  

### 一、足球及其供能特点  
#### （一）足球  
足球是一项以技能为主导的同场竞技运动，要求场上运动员密切配合，比赛时间长，体能消耗大。它具有以下主要特点：  
1. **耐力**：一场足球比赛持续90分钟，要求运动员保持高强度的跑动。  
2. **灵敏性**：运动员需要根据场上情况做出适当调整，如攻防转换或守门员扑救，这需要较强的观察能力和移动能力。  
3. **爆发力**：突破对手、拦截球和射门等动作往往要求运动员具备足够的爆发力。

abstract: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的必要性，从思政元素梳理和挖掘及再融入、关键词的深入挖掘分类构建成网、模式评价等五方面，以《动物生物化学》为例详细说明了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式有待发展的不足之处。
ZH_EN: This paper elucidates the necessity of constructing a keyword-triggered ideological and political teaching model, detailing the process through five aspects: the organization and excavation of ideological and political elements and their reintegration, the in-depth exploration and classification of keywords to form a network, and model evaluation, using "Animal Biochemistry" as an example. It also highlights the areas where the keyword-triggered ideological and political teaching model requires further development.
EN_ZH: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式思政教学模式的必要性，并以《动物生物化学》为例，从思政元素的梳理与挖掘及其再融入、关键词的深度挖掘与分类以形成网络、模式评价五个方面详细介绍了构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式思政教学模式有待进一步发展的方面。

abstract: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的必要性，从思政元素梳理和挖掘及再融入、关键词的深入挖掘分类构建成网、模式评价等五方面，以《动物生物化学》为例详细说明了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式课程思政教学模式有待发展的不足之处。
ZH_EN: This article elucidates the necessity of constructing a keyword-triggered ideological and political teaching model for courses. It details the construction process of this model using "Animal Biochemistry" as an example, focusing on five aspects: the organization and excavation of ideological and political elements and their reintegration, the in-depth excavation and classification of keywords to form a network, and model evaluation. Additionally, it points out the existing shortcomings of the keyword-triggered ideological and political teaching model that need further development.
EN_ZH: 本文阐述了构建课程关键词触发式思政教学模式的必要性，并以《动物生物化学》为例，从思政元素梳理与挖掘及其再融入、关键词的深度挖掘与分类并形成网络、模式评价等五个方面详细介绍了该模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式思政教学模式存在的不足，有待进一步发展。

ZH_EN: This paper elucidates the necessity of constructing a keyword-triggered ideological and political teaching model, detailing the process of building such a model through five aspects: the organization and excavation of ideological and political elements and their reintegration, the in-depth mining and classification of keywords to form a network, and model evaluation, using "Animal Biochemistry" as an example. It also points out the shortcomings that need to be addressed in the development of the keyword-triggered ideological and political teaching model.
EN_ZH: 本文阐述了构建关键词触发式思政教学模式的必要性，并以《动物生物化学》为例，从思政元素的梳理挖掘与再融入、关键词的深度挖掘与分类形成网络、模式评价等五个方面详细介绍了该模式的构建过程，同时指出了关键词触发式思政教学模式发展中需要改进的不足之处。

abstract: 化学除油器作为一种水处理设备，在钢铁及石油化工行业得到了广泛的应用。文章根据高速棒材生产线轧钢废水处理水质要求，结合项目实际情况，通过对比化学除油与稀土磁盘两种废水处理工艺可知，在水质效果稳定性方面，化学除油器工艺比稀土磁盘稳定，增效的办法更多，且处理效果更好。同时，在节省建设用地、降低一次性投资费用方面都有较大的优势。文章根据工艺要求提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，论述了化学除油器工艺流程、工作原理、药剂投加特点与应用，以期为相关行业发展提供参考。
ZH_EN: As a water treatment equipment, chemical oil removers have been widely used in the steel and petrochemical industries. Based on the water quality requirements for the treatment of rolling mill wastewater in high-speed bar production lines and the actual conditions of the project, this article compares the chemical oil removal process with the rare earth disk process. It is concluded that the chemical oil removal process is more stable in terms of water quality effectiveness, offers more methods for efficiency enhancement, and delivers better treatment results. Additionally, it has significant advantages in saving construction land and reducing initial investment costs. The article proposes a design plan for chemical oil removal equipment based on process requirements and discusses the process flow, working principles, dosing characteristics, and applications of chemical oil removers, aiming to provide references for the development of related industries.
EN_ZH: 作为水处理设备，化学除油器已在钢铁、石化等行业得到广泛应用。本文根据高速棒材生产线轧钢废水处理的水质要求及工程实际情况，将化学除油工艺与稀土磁盘工艺进行对比，得出化学除油工艺在水质效果上更为稳定，提效方式更多，处理效果更好，且在节约建设用地、降低初期投资成本方面具有显著优势。文章根据工艺要求提出了化学除油设备的设计方案，并对化学除油器的工艺流程、工作原理、加药特点及应用进行了探讨，以期为相关行业的发展提供参考。

ZH_EN: As a water treatment equipment, chemical oil removers have been widely used in the steel and petrochemical industries. Based on the water quality requirements for steel rolling wastewater treatment in high-speed bar production lines and the actual conditions of the project, this article compares two wastewater treatment processes: chemical oil removal and rare earth magnetic disks. It concludes that the chemical oil remover process is more stable in terms of water quality effectiveness, offers more methods for enhancing efficiency, and delivers better treatment results. Additionally, it has significant advantages in saving construction land and reducing initial investment costs. The article proposes a design scheme for chemical oil remover equipment based on process requirements and discusses the process flow, working principles, chemical dosing characteristics, and applications of chemical oil removers, aiming to provide references for the development of related industries.
EN_ZH: 作为水处理设备，化学除油器在钢铁、石化等行业得到了广泛应用。本文根据高速棒材生产线轧钢废水处理的水质要求及工程实际情况，对化学除油与稀土磁盘两种废水处理工艺进行了比较，得出化学除油器工艺在水质效果上更为稳定，提高效率的方法更多，处理效果更好，且在节约建设用地、降低初期投资成本方面具有显著优势。文章根据工艺要求提出了化学除油器设备的设计方案，并就化学除油器的工艺流程、工作原理、加药特点及应用进行了探讨，以期为相关行业的发展提供参考。

abstract: <正>立足“新工科”专业教育场域,物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等专业人才的一项基本素养,在学科设置上,具备一定的前置条件,通常应在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范的基础上,以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器、方法之后,再进入的物理化学实验领域。基于教学主体视角,物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验及规律去解决化学问题,这意味着单个物理化学实验项目有着复合属性,所涉及的教学理论与实践过程也更为丰富、复杂。
ZH_EN: In the context of "New Engineering" professional education, the ability to conduct physical chemistry experiments is a fundamental competency for professionals in fields such as chemistry, materials, biology, and environmental protection. In terms of curriculum design, it has certain prerequisites, typically requiring a systematic understanding of the basic principles and operational standards of analytical chemistry experiments, as well as familiarity with conventional experimental tools, instruments, and methods, before entering the field of physical chemistry experiments. From the perspective of teaching, the core essence of physical chemistry experiments lies in applying physics knowledge, techniques, experience, and principles to solve chemical problems. This implies that individual physical chemistry experiments possess a composite nature, involving richer and more complex teaching theories and practical processes.
EN_ZH: 在“新工科”专业教育背景下，开展物理化学实验的能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等领域专业人才的基本素养。从课程设计角度而言，其具备一定的前置性，通常需要系统掌握分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范，熟悉常规实验工具、仪器与方法，方可进入物理化学实验领域。从教学角度而言，物理化学实验的核心精髓在于运用物理学的知识、技术、经验与原理解决化学问题，这意味着单个物理化学实验具备复合性，涉及更丰富、更复杂的教学理论与实操过程。

abstract: <正>立足“新工科”专业教育场域,物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等专业人才的一项基本素养,在学科设置上,具备一定的前置条件,通常应在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范的基础上,以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器、方法之后,再进入的物理化学实验领域。基于教学主体视角,物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验及规律去解决化学问题,这意味着单个物理化学实验项目有着复合属性,所涉及的教学理论与实践过程也更为丰富、复杂。
ZH_EN: In the realm of "New Engineering" professional education, the ability to conduct physical chemistry experiments is a fundamental competency for professionals in chemistry, materials, biology, environmental protection, and related fields. In terms of curriculum design, certain prerequisites are typically required, such as a systematic understanding of the basic principles and operational standards of analytical chemistry experiments, as well as familiarity with conventional experimental tools, instruments, and methods, before delving into the field of physical chemistry experiments. From the perspective of teaching, the core essence of physical chemistry experiments lies in applying physics knowledge, techniques, experience, and principles to solve chemical problems. This implies that individual physical chemistry experiments possess a composite nature, involving a richer and more complex interplay of teaching theory and practical processes.
EN_ZH: 在“新工科”专业教育领域中，物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等相关专业人才的基本能力。从课程设计角度而言，通常需要具备一定的先修条件，即对分析化学实验的基本原理和操作规范有系统性的认识，对常规实验工具、仪器和方法较为熟悉，才能进入物理化学实验领域。从教学角度而言，物理化学实验的核心本质在于运用物理学的知识、技术、经验和原理来解决化学问题，这意味着单个物理化学实验具有复合性，涉及的教学理论和实践过程更为丰富复杂。

abstract: <正>立足“新工科”专业教育场域,物理化学实验能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等专业人才的一项基本素养,在学科设置上,具备一定的前置条件,通常应在系统学习分析化学实验的基本原理与操作规范的基础上,以及熟悉常规实验工具、仪器、方法之后,再进入的物理化学实验领域。基于教学主体视角,物理化学实验的基本内涵是运用物理学知识、技术、经验及规律去解决化学问题,这意味着单个物理化学实验项目有着复合属性,所涉及的教学理论与实践过程也更为丰富、复杂。
ZH_EN: In the context of "New Engineering" professional education, the ability to conduct physical chemistry experiments is a fundamental competency for professionals in chemistry, materials, biology, environmental protection, and related fields. In terms of curriculum design, certain prerequisites are required, typically including a systematic understanding of the basic principles and operational standards of analytical chemistry experiments, as well as familiarity with conventional experimental tools, instruments, and methods, before entering the field of physical chemistry experiments. From the perspective of teaching, the core essence of physical chemistry experiments lies in applying physics knowledge, techniques, experience, and principles to solve chemical problems. This implies that individual physical chemistry experiments possess a composite nature, and the associated teaching theories and practical processes are more diverse and complex.
EN_ZH: 在“新工科”专业教育背景下，开展物理化学实验的能力是化学、材料、生物、环保等相关领域专业人才的基本素养。从课程设置上看，存在一定的前置条件，通常需在系统掌握分析化学实验基本原理与操作规范，熟悉常规实验工具、仪器与方法后，方可进入物理化学实验领域。从教学角度看，物理化学实验的核心要义在于运用物理学的知识、技术、经验与原理解决化学问题，这意味着单个物理化学实验具有复合性，相应的教学理论与实施过程也更为多元与复杂。

abstract: 思政教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环境保护意识。但在课程思政视域下，当前部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足，教学定位较模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺失综合素养评估等问题。对此，教师可采取如下教学策略：深挖化学思政元素，促进学生科学精神养成；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程思政理念；建设思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。
ZH_EN: The deep integration of ideological and political education resources with high school chemistry curriculum can enhance students' scientific inquiry abilities, strengthen their sense of social responsibility, and raise environmental awareness. However, from the perspective of curriculum-based ideological and political education, some high school chemistry teaching in certain schools still faces issues such as insufficient integration of ideological and political elements, vague teaching objectives, monotonous forms of ideological and political teaching, limited innovation in chemical inquiry, biased teaching evaluations, and a lack of comprehensive quality assessment. To address these issues, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: deeply explore ideological and political elements in chemistry to foster students' scientific spirit; innovate experimental teaching designs to help students practice the concept of curriculum-based ideological and political education; and establish an ideological and political evaluation mechanism to focus on students' holistic development, thereby promoting the coordinated development of high school chemistry curriculum teaching in both subject education and ideological and political education.
EN_ZH: 高中化学课程与思想政治教育资源的深度融合，能够提升学生的科学探究能力，增强社会责任感，提高环保意识。然而，从课程思政的视角来看，部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足、教学目标模糊、思政教学形式单一、化学探究创新有限、教学评价偏颇、综合素质评价缺失等问题。针对这些问题，教师可采取以下教学策略：深入挖掘化学中的思政元素，培育学生的科学精神；创新实验教学设计，助力学生践行课程思政理念；建立思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，从而推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育上的协同发展。

abstract: 思政教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环境保护意识。但在课程思政视域下，当前部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足，教学定位较模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺失综合素养评估等问题。对此，教师可采取如下教学策略：深挖化学思政元素，促进学生科学精神养成；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程思政理念；建设思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。
ZH_EN: The deep integration of ideological and political education resources with high school chemistry courses can enhance students' scientific inquiry abilities, strengthen their sense of social responsibility, and raise their awareness of environmental protection. However, from the perspective of curriculum-based ideological and political education, some high school chemistry teaching in certain schools still faces issues such as insufficient integration of ideological and political elements, vague teaching orientations, monotonous forms of ideological and political teaching, limited innovation in chemical inquiry, biased teaching evaluations, and a lack of comprehensive literacy assessments. To address these issues, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: deeply explore ideological and political elements in chemistry to foster students' scientific spirit; innovate experimental teaching designs to help students practice curriculum-based ideological and political concepts; and establish ideological and political evaluation mechanisms to focus on students' holistic development, thereby promoting the coordinated development of subject education and ideological and political education in high school chemistry teaching.
EN_ZH: 高中化学课程与思想政治教育资源的深度融合，能够提升学生的科学探究能力，增强社会责任感，提高环保意识。但从课程思政视角来看，部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足、教学导向模糊、思政教学形式单一、化学探究创新有限、教学评价偏颇、素养测评不全等问题。针对这些问题，教师可采取以下教学策略：深入挖掘化学中的思政元素，培育学生科学精神；创新实验教学设计，助力学生践行课程思政理念；建立思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，从而促进高中化学教学中学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。

abstract: 思政教育资源与高中化学课程的深度融合可提升学生的科学探究能力，增强其社会责任感和环境保护意识。但在课程思政视域下，当前部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足，教学定位较模糊；思政教学形式单一，化学探究创新受限；教学评价存在偏差，缺失综合素养评估等问题。对此，教师可采取如下教学策略：深挖化学思政元素，促进学生科学精神养成；创新实验教学设计，帮助学生实践课程思政理念；建设思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此推动高中化学课程教学在学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。
ZH_EN: The deep integration of ideological and political education resources with high school chemistry curriculum can enhance students' scientific inquiry abilities, strengthen their sense of social responsibility, and raise their awareness of environmental protection. However, from the perspective of curriculum-based ideological and political education, some high school chemistry teaching in certain schools still faces issues such as insufficient integration of ideological and political elements, vague teaching objectives, monotonous forms of ideological and political teaching, limited innovation in chemical inquiry, biased teaching evaluations, and a lack of comprehensive quality assessment. To address these issues, teachers can adopt the following teaching strategies: deeply explore the ideological and political elements in chemistry to foster students' scientific spirit; innovate experimental teaching designs to help students practice the concept of curriculum-based ideological and political education; and establish an ideological and political evaluation mechanism to focus on the holistic development of students, thereby promoting the coordinated development of subject education and ideological and political education in high school chemistry teaching.
EN_ZH: 高中化学课程与思想政治教育资源的深度融合，能够提升学生的科学探究能力，增强社会责任感，提高环保意识。但从课程思政视角来看，部分学校的高中化学教学仍存在思政元素融入不足、教学目标模糊、思政教学形式单一、化学探究创新有限、教学评价偏颇、素质测评欠缺等问题。针对这些问题，教师可采取如下教学策略:深度挖掘化学中的思政元素，培养学生的科学精神;创新实验教学设计，助力学生践行课程思政理念;建立思政评价机制，关注学生全面发展，以此促进高中化学教学中学科教育与思政教育的协同发展。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid advancement of technology, particularly the widespread adoption of computer and network technologies, has presented new challenges to traditional physical chemistry education. How to integrate computational chemistry into physical chemistry teaching has become a significant topic in current educational reform. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching and to propose the challenges and prospects of its integration, with the goal of enhancing students' interest in the subject and their academic performance. Research indicates that through methods such as molecular simulation and quantum chemical calculations, students can gain a deeper understanding of abstract concepts like reaction thermodynamics and kinetics. Additionally, leveraging research to inform teaching and incorporating hands-on computational sessions can stimulate students' innovative potential and cultivate their scientific research mindset.
EN_ZH: 技术的飞速进步，尤其是计算机和网络技术的广泛应用，给传统的物理化学教育带来了新的挑战。如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学，已成为当前教育改革的重要课题。本文旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出其融合的挑战与前景，以期提升学生的学习兴趣和学业成绩。研究表明，通过分子模拟和量子化学计算等方法，学生能更深入地理解反应热力学和动力学等抽象概念。此外，以研促教，结合上机计算环节，能够激发学生的创新潜能，培养其科研思维。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid advancement of technology, particularly the widespread adoption of computer and network technologies, has presented new challenges to traditional physical chemistry education. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry teaching and to propose the challenges and prospects of its integration, with the goal of enhancing students' interest in the subject and their academic performance. Research indicates that through methods such as molecular simulation and quantum chemical calculations, students can gain a deeper understanding of abstract concepts such as reaction thermodynamics and kinetics. Additionally, leveraging research to inform teaching and incorporating hands-on computational sessions can stimulate students' innovative potential and cultivate their scientific research mindset.
EN_ZH: 技术的飞速进步，尤其是计算机和网络技术的广泛应用，给传统的物理化学教育带来了新的挑战。将计算化学融入物理化学教学已成为当前教育改革的重要课题。本文旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出其融合所面临的挑战与前景，以提升学生对该学科的兴趣及学业表现。研究表明，通过分子模拟和量子化学计算等方法，学生能够更深入地理解反应热力学和动力学等抽象概念。此外，以研促教，结合实践计算环节，能够激发学生的创新潜力，培养其科研思维。

abstract: 科技的迅猛发展，尤其是计算机和网络技术的普及，使传统物理化学教学面临着新的挑战，如何将计算化学融入物理化学教学中，成了当前教育改革的重要课题。文章旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教学中的应用，并提出计算化学在物理化学教学中应用的挑战与展望，以提高学生的学科兴趣和学术表现。研究表明，借助分子模拟、量子化学计算等方法，学生可以更深入地理解反应热力学、反应动力学等抽象概念；利用科研反哺教学、增设上机环节等方式，可以激发学生创新潜力，培养学生的科研思维。
ZH_EN: The rapid advancement of technology, particularly the widespread adoption of computer and network technologies, has presented new challenges to traditional physical chemistry education. Integrating computational chemistry into physical chemistry teaching has become a crucial topic in current educational reform. This article aims to explore the application of computational chemistry in physical chemistry education and discusses the challenges and prospects of its integration, with the goal of enhancing students' interest in the subject and academic performance. Research indicates that through methods such as molecular simulation and quantum chemical calculations, students can gain a deeper understanding of abstract concepts like reaction thermodynamics and kinetics. Additionally, leveraging research to inform teaching and incorporating hands-on computational sessions can stimulate students' innovative potential and cultivate their scientific research mindset.
EN_ZH: 技术的飞速进步，尤其是计算机和网络技术的广泛应用，给传统的物理化学教育带来了新的挑战。将计算化学融入物理化学教学已成为当前教育改革的重要课题。本文旨在探讨计算化学在物理化学教育中的应用，并讨论其融合的挑战与前景，以提升学生对该学科的兴趣和学业表现。研究表明，通过分子模拟和量子化学计算等方法，学生能更深入地理解反应热力学和动力学等抽象概念。此外，利用科研反哺教学，并结合实践计算环节，可激发学生的创新潜能，培养其科研思维。

abstract: 文章以上饶师范学院为例，首先阐述了化学师范生工匠精神的内涵，然后分析了化学师范生工匠精神培育与师范专业认证的内在联系，接着论述了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的意义，之后提出了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的路径，最后总结了师范专业认证背景下化学师范生工匠精神培育的成效，其中路径包括进行顶层设计，把工匠精神融入化学师范专业人才培养方案；开展榜样宣传，把工匠精神融入榜样模范引领；推进教学改革，把工匠精神融入课堂教学和实训实践。
ZH_EN: The article takes Shangrao Normal University as an example, first elaborating on the connotation of the craftsmanship spirit among chemistry teacher trainees. It then analyzes the intrinsic connection between the cultivation of this craftsmanship spirit and teacher education program accreditation. Following this, it discusses the significance of fostering the craftsmanship spirit among chemistry teacher trainees in the context of program accreditation. Subsequently, it proposes pathways for cultivating this spirit under the accreditation framework, including top-level design to integrate craftsmanship into the chemistry teacher training program, promoting role models to embed craftsmanship in exemplary leadership, and advancing teaching reforms to incorporate craftsmanship into classroom instruction and practical training. Finally, it summarizes the outcomes of cultivating the craftsmanship spirit among chemistry teacher trainees in the context of program accreditation.

abstract: 化学分析检测是一项复杂性任务，涉及众多可能的干扰变量。为确保化学分析检测得到令人满意的结果，必须在检测分析前进行有效的质量管理，化学分析仪器的计量检测是其中不可或缺的一部分。文章详细阐释了化学分析仪器管理及计量检测过程中的不足之处，并提供了针对性的改善方案，旨在确保化学制品计量检测结果的可信度。
ZH_EN: Chemical analysis and testing is a complex task involving numerous potential interfering variables. To ensure satisfactory results in chemical analysis and testing, effective quality management must be implemented prior to the analysis. The metrological testing of chemical analysis instruments is an indispensable part of this process. This article elaborates on the shortcomings in the management and metrological testing of chemical analysis instruments and provides targeted improvement solutions, aiming to ensure the reliability of metrological testing results for chemical products.
EN_ZH: 化学分析与检测是一项复杂的任务，涉及众多潜在的干扰变量。为确保化学分析与检测结果令人满意，必须在分析前实施有效的质量管理。化学分析仪器的计量测试是这一过程中不可或缺的部分。本文详细阐述了化学分析仪器在管理和计量测试方面的不足，并提供了针对性的改进方案，旨在确保化工产品计量测试结果的可靠性。

abstract: 挖掘天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，将思政教育与专业知识教学有机融合，有助于培养具备专业技能，创新能力和强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，以树立专业自信、文化自信；引导守正创新，把握科学发展的内涵；传递家国情怀，助力学生凝聚奋进力量3个方面阐释了天然药物化学课程思政建设的案例设计和教学探索。
ZH_EN: Exploring the ideological and political education resources embedded in the natural medicinal chemistry curriculum and organically integrating ideological and political education with professional knowledge teaching can help cultivate pharmaceutical talents with professional skills, innovative capabilities, and a strong sense of social responsibility. This article outlines the basic situation of the natural medicinal chemistry curriculum, aiming to establish professional confidence and cultural confidence; guide adherence to integrity and innovation, grasp the essence of scientific development; and convey a sense of national sentiment, helping students gather strength for progress. It elaborates on the case design and teaching exploration of ideological and political construction in the natural medicinal chemistry curriculum from these three aspects.
EN_ZH: 探索天然药物化学课程中蕴含的思想政治教育资源，将思想政治教育与专业知识教学有机融合，有助于培养具有专业技能、创新能力及强烈社会责任感的药学人才。本文概述了天然药物化学课程的基本情况，旨在树立专业自信与文化自信；引导守正创新，把握科学发展精髓；传递家国情怀，助力学生凝聚奋进力量。从这三个方面阐述了天然药物化学课程思政建设的案例设计与教学探索。
